programme.title: North Americas National Parks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Americas National Parks - Yellowstone
programme.desc: Yellowstone National Park is an American national park located in the western United States, largely in the northwest corner of Wyoming and extending into Montana, and Idaho. It was established by the U.S. Congress and signed into law by President Ulysses S. Grant on March 1, 1872. Yellowstone was the first national park in the U.S. and is also widely held to be the first national park in the world. The park is known for its wildlife and its many geothermal features, especially Old Faithful geyser, one of its most popular. While it represents many types of biomes, the subalpine forest is the most abundant. It is part of the South Central Rockies forests ecoregion.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Of Koalas and Drones
programme.desc: Lone Pine Koala Sanctuary was opened in 1927 at a time when Koalas were still being killed on a large scale for the fur trade. Today, hardly anything threatens the natural habitats of these animals as much as the desertification of the forests. We let the drones fly and are there when a new tree is planted.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 wOf Kangaroos and Conservation
programme.desc: Visiting the fenced nature reserve Arid Recovery in southern Australia, we witness the care of an injured kangaroo and follow researchers at the Hidden Vale Wildlife Centre near Brisbane as they train native animals to detect tracks of threatening predators and then move to safety.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Of Fairy Penguins and GPS Trackers
programme.desc: Australias largest fur seal colony is located on Phillip Island. Night after night, a breathtaking spectacle takes place here: At sunset, countless fairy penguins return from their hunt for fish. In the station near the penguin colony, pioneering scientific research is conducted around the cute animals. We learn how dedicated scientists are trying to secure the future of the fairy penguins with the help of GPS trackers.

programme.title: Symphony of the Seas - Underwater Wonders of Australias Ocean
programme.desc: Our journeys take us all around the world from Patagonia to the USA, from Greenland to South Africa and from Cambodia to Australia and leads us to the most fascinating places where landscapes animals and humans are the main focus of our documentaries. Whether on land or at sea – the last paradises of the world are our destination.

programme.title: Jacques Cousteaus Legacy - Return To The Undersea World
programme.desc: A composition of wildlife footage, archive material and elaborate re-enactments results in a brilliant reconstruction of the life of famed marine biologist and environmental pioneer Jacques Cousteau. On the trail of the most famous oceanographer of the 20th Century, the team spent two years filming original locations on three different continents, in four different oceans. The film charts how Cousteau’s outlook on the environment changed throughout his many decades at sea around the globe. On his personal journey to enlightenment, he changed from a man who killed sharks in hate and thoughtlessly blew up coral reefs, to a radical environmentalist.

programme.title: Red Panda - Worlds Cutest Animal
programme.desc: The Red Panda is undoubtedly one of the most beautiful animals on earth and this is the first ever intimate portrait ever made.

programme.title: New Life
programme.desc: In a land of dangers, plant-eating animals are always at risk, and never more so than at the time of their birth; out on the open they are vulnerable and there are few places to hide. But luckily some are born to run …

programme.title: New Life
programme.desc: Its a water world and life couldnt survive without it. And thanks to it, a mind blowing diversity of creatures thrive beneath the surface. Born to enjoy the riches underwater they must master their bodys adaptations, learn to find food, to escape danger and above all become expert swimmers! Whether its in rivers, on beaches or in the deep ocean, all must overcome the obstacles and fulfil their destiny, all are born to swim! Of all the habitats on earth, the ocean is perhaps the most challenging. Here salt, temperatures, currents and predators can make life difficult; its not an obvious place to want to bring up your babies… But even in these waters generation after generation beats...

programme.title: New Life
programme.desc: Baby animals beguile with their innocent charm. But while some remain harmless, others have a deep-rooted instinct. It may take weeks or months of training to hone their skills. Their landscapes and lifestyles maybe very different, but these babies are born to hunt.

programme.title: Wild Medicine - Animals Superpowers
programme.desc: Nature has many weird creatures to offer and often these animals fascinate us the most. There are ants in Australias outback that use specialised workers as living honey pots. In Africa in the endless Bangweulu wetlands of Zambia the shoebill is on the hunt for fish, a bird that definitely lives up to its name. Finally in the Brazilian rainforests lurk gruesome river monsters in the Amazon abyss that send shivers down the spine of even the most experienced divers. But there are also intense human-animal-relationships like the close bond between a German diver and a dolphin female who explore the Atlantic off the coast of Ireland, or the "easy rider" in California who has taken care of an...

programme.title: Unusual World
programme.desc: The dominance of air has always been in the mind of men, but nature only gave the gift to flight to certain animals. Amongst these, to the insects. Thanks to their wings, the insects have conquered most parts of the planet’s diverse environment. What are the reasons for such an amazing biological success without comparison in the history of the animal world?

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Of Flying Foxes and Heat Waves
programme.desc: While the Tolga Bat Hospital is looking after endangered flying foxes, researchers are using thermographic cameras to search for flying foxes and koalas. But they can also detect bush and wildfire more quickly.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Of Sea Turtles and Coral Reefs
programme.desc: The Cairns Turtle Rehabilitation Center (CTRC) raises and cares for sick, or injured turtles, while the Schmidt Ocean Institute goes on a diving mission with a high-tech underwater rover. In this way, we learn firsthand about the state of Australias sensitive marine animals natural habitat and what needs to be done to ensure their survival.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Of Wombats and Vaccines
programme.desc: Tasmanias Bonorong Wildlife Sanctuary used to be a traditional wildlife park - now it is an innovative and active wildlife sanctuary and home to the famous Tasmanian Devil, to wombats, and many other native species. But unfortunately, "Tassie Devils" are particularly endangered by the Devil Facial Tumor Disease (DFTD). We accompany the team of young, ambitious scientists on their fight against the disease.

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Of Koalas and Drones
programme.desc: Lone Pine Koala Sanctuary was opened in 1927 at a time when Koalas were still being killed on a large scale for the fur trade. programme.title: Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II: Great Gobi National Park: Mongolia – Following the Wild Camels
programme.desc: The jungle in northern Vietnam is nearly impenetrable, with some areas never touched by humans. The remote rainforests of Pu Mat National Park serve as a refuge for endangered wildlife such as black bears, monkeys, and pangolins. Tuan, a biologist and bear specialist, embarks on an expedition to these untouched regions of the park in search of bears. The most hunted animal here is the pangolin, sought after for its scales believed to have medicinal properties and its meat considered a delicacy. A small Vietnamese conservation organization fights for the survival of this species.

programme.title: Faroe Islands - A Secret Beauty
programme.desc: The Faroe Islands in the North Atlantic, located in the middle of the Gulf Stream between Scotland and Iceland, are an archipelago of eighteen green volcanic islands where a unique culture has developed over the last thousand years. As direct descendants of the Vikings, the Faroese feel committed to their traditions and hold on to customs, without missing out on the advantages of the modern and globalised world - from archaic hunter and shepherd culture to contemporary art. With the highest birth rate in Europe and the lowest social inequality in the world, the just fifty thousand Faroese are a very special people living on one of the last natural paradises in Europe.

programme.title: mareTV: The white wilderness in Greenlands East
programme.desc: Fjords, glaciers and the highest mountains in the Arctic: East Greenland with its spectacular nature is one of the most sparsely populated regions on earth. The people here live in extreme isolation and depend on helicopter flights for their supplies. Despite harsh conditions, the inhabitants here lovingly maintain their traditions and enjoy their outdoor leisure time even at minus 20 degrees Celsius. The town of Tasiilaq is the "metropolis" with 4,000 inhabitants and offers a very special attraction: the only ski lift on the east coast. Thomas Mikaelsen, the lift attendant, is not to be envied for his job. The only 100 meter long lift comes from Switzerland and is already 20 years old....

programme.title: Magical Moors
programme.desc: Wide open heaths, windswept and barren in winter, are transformed into wonderful carpets of white, fluffy cotton grass in summer. Large bears and wolves roam alongside delicately fluttering butterflies, the bubbling calls of black grouse and the enchanting trills of the great snipe. Moors, bogs and wetlands can be found all over in Europe. Everyone has at least heard about this habitat but most know little about it. It is an ancient yet largely unknown set of landscapes that is full of enchanting surprises. On a warm spring day, poisonous adders emerge from hiding to perform their impressive mating dance. As dusk falls, snipe gather on traditional leks, leaping and singing to impress the...

programme.title: The Sudheide - Woods, meadows, open country
programme.desc: Forests and fields, moors and heathland, shepherds and sheep - these are the symbols of an ostensibly unspoilt landscape that has inspired poets and painters alike for centuries. The secret of the almost 500 km² nature reserve Naturpark Sudheide lies in its diversity: the origins of its soil, geology and topography can be traced back to the ice age. But the region between Hamburg and Hannover is anything but unspoilt. For centuries, it was synonymous with heathland farmers and formed as a North German cultivated landscape. This documentary tells of an almost unknown region, which has been strongly influenced by mankind for centuries, yet still remains diverse in its nature. Nature...

programme.title: 15th Meridian East - Similarity in Difference
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Wild Life, Gentle Nature
programme.desc: As contrasting as the landscapes of the 15th meridian east, so different are its animal inhabitants. What are the living conditions like in the heat of the Namibian Damaraland, in Lusatia or on the coast of Norway? Which challenges do elephants, whales or kingfishers have to master together with their companions from north to south?

programme.title: 15th Meridian East - Similarity in Difference
programme.desc: Almost 11000 kilometres lie between the northernmost and southernmost point of the 15th meridian east. Here you will find extreme landscapes such as the shimmering heat of Africa or the eternal cold of northern Scandinavia. Five people from Spitsbergen, Namibia, Slovenia, Germany and Poland dedicate their lives to environmental protection.

programme.title: 15th Meridian East - Similarity in Difference
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Sow, Harvest, Eat – Our Conservatory
programme.desc: This episode focuses on people from five countries who share a common passion: The production of their own food and food. What culinary treasures are hidden in the different regions, from Spitsbergen to Sweden, Austria, Poland and Chad?

programme.title: 15th Meridian East - Similarity in Difference
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 From Generation to Generation
programme.desc: The journey leads from the Norwegian Vesterålen to Chad, the Aeolian Islands and the Polish Giant Mountains. As different as the landscapes and cultures may be, all people are united in their love for their children and their desire to give something to tomorrows generation.

programme.title: 15th Meridian East - Similarity in Difference
programme.desc: What ideas are people on the 15th meridian east developing to shape the future and leave tomorrows generations a home worth living in? This consequence leads us to four future designers. From the barren Namib Desert to the glacier worlds of Spitsbergen, Sicily and the Croatian Mediterranean.

programme.title: Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II: Gir National Park: India – Asia’s Last Lion
programme.desc: In the far west of India, unexpected predators roam: lions. Living freely in a human-inhabited area without fences, they occasionally prey on the livestock of the indigenous Maldhari people, who nevertheless take pride in sharing their region with these lions—a unique coexistence of humans and predators. In northern Gujarat, desert landscapes dominate, where semi-nomadic communities breed a unique camel breed capable of swimming: Karai camels swim up to 3km daily to mangrove islands for grazing.

programme.title: Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II: Kinabatangan River: Borneo – Forgotten Paradise
programme.desc: In Sabah, northern Borneo, flows the 560km-long Kinabatangan River. Nowhere else in Sabah are wild animals as easily spotted as along this river: orangutans, elephants, crocodiles, and proboscis monkeys. However, biodiversity is threatened as more rainforest gives way to palm oil plantations. Wildlife ventures into inhabited areas in search of food, leading to conflicts. Locals are fighting to preserve the rainforest and its unique wildlife, demonstrating that conservation and prosperity can coexist even in a modern society.

programme.title: Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II: Pu Mat National Park: Vietnam – Of Bears and Men
programme.desc: The jungle in northern Vietnam is nearly impenetrable, with some areas never touched by humans. The remote rainforests of Pu Mat National Park serve as a refuge for endangered wildlife such as black bears, monkeys, and pangolins. Tuan, a biologist and bear specialist, embarks on an expedition to these untouched regions of the park in search of bears. The most hunted animal here is the pangolin, sought after for its scales believed to have medicinal properties and its meat considered a delicacy. A small Vietnamese conservation organization fights for the survival of this species.

programme.title: Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II: Gaoligongshan Park: China – Himalaya’s Gold
programme.desc: The Great Gobi National Park in southwestern Mongolia shelters one of the last populations of wild Bactrian camels, amid its ancient and mysterious desert landscape. With around 800 critically endangered animals, the Gobi remains one of the worlds most sparsely inhabited and inhospitable regions, yet its allure is undeniable, offering a captivating backdrop for encounters with wild camels and stories of people deeply connected to nature.

programme.title: Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Asia - Secret Lives Hidden Places II: Great Gobi National Park: Mongolia – Following the Wild Camels
programme.desc: The jungle in northern Vietnam is nearly impenetrable, with some areas never touched by humans. The remote rainforests of Pu Mat National Park serve as a refuge for endangered wildlife such as black bears, monkeys, and pangolins. Tuan, a biologist and bear specialist, embarks on an expedition to these untouched regions of the park in search of bears. The most hunted animal here is the pangolin, sought after for its scales believed to have medicinal properties and its meat considered a delicacy. A small Vietnamese conservation organization fights for the survival of this species.

programme.title: Faroe Islands - A Secret Beauty
programme.desc: The Faroe Islands in the North Atlantic, located in the middle of the Gulf Stream between Scotland and Iceland, are an archipelago of eighteen green volcanic islands where a unique culture has developed over the last thousand years. As direct descendants of the Vikings, the Faroese feel committed to their traditions and hold on to customs, without missing out on the advantages of the modern and globalised world - from archaic hunter and shepherd culture to contemporary art. With the highest birth rate in Europe and the lowest social inequality in the world, the just fifty thousand Faroese are a very special people living on one of the last natural paradises in Europe.

programme.title: mareTV: The white wilderness in Greenlands East
programme.desc: Fjords, glaciers and the highest mountains in the Arctic: East Greenland with its spectacular nature is one of the most sparsely populated regions on earth. The people here live in extreme isolation and depend on helicopter flights for their supplies. Despite harsh conditions, the inhabitants here lovingly maintain their traditions and enjoy their outdoor leisure time even at minus 20 degrees Celsius. The town of Tasiilaq is the "metropolis" with 4,000 inhabitants and offers a very special attraction: the only ski lift on the east coast. Thomas Mikaelsen, the lift attendant, is not to be envied for his job. The only 100 meter long lift comes from Switzerland and is already 20 years old....

programme.title: Magical Moors
programme.desc: Wide open heaths, windswept and barren in winter, are transformed into wonderful carpets of white, fluffy cotton grass in summer. Large bears and wolves roam alongside delicately fluttering butterflies, the bubbling calls of black grouse and the enchanting trills of the great snipe. Moors, bogs and wetlands can be found all over in Europe. Everyone has at least heard about this habitat but most know little about it. It is an ancient yet largely unknown set of landscapes that is full of enchanting surprises. On a warm spring day, poisonous adders emerge from hiding to perform their impressive mating dance. As dusk falls, snipe gather on traditional leks, leaping and singing to impress the...

programme.title: The Sudheide - Woods, meadows, open country
programme.desc: Forests and fields, moors and heathland, shepherds and sheep - these are the symbols of an ostensibly unspoilt landscape that has inspired poets and painters alike for centuries. The secret of the almost 500 km² nature reserve Naturpark Sudheide lies in its diversity: the origins of its soil, geology and topography can be traced back to the ice age. But the region between Hamburg and Hannover is anything but unspoilt. For centuries, it was synonymous with heathland farmers and formed as a North German cultivated landscape. This documentary tells of an almost unknown region, which has been strongly influenced by mankind for centuries, yet still remains diverse in its nature. Nature...

programme.title: 15th Meridian East - Similarity in Difference
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Wild Life, Gentle Nature
programme.desc: As contrasting as the landscapes of the 15th meridian east, so different are its animal inhabitants. What are the living conditions like in the heat of the Namibian Damaraland, in Lusatia or on the coast of Norway? Which challenges do elephants, whales or kingfishers have to master together with their companions from north to south?

programme.title: 15th Meridian East - Similarity in Difference
programme.desc: Almost 11000 kilometres lie between the northernmost and southernmost point of the 15th meridian east. Here you will find extreme landscapes such as the shimmering heat of Africa or the eternal cold of northern Scandinavia. Five people from Spitsbergen, Namibia, Slovenia, Germany and Poland dedicate their lives to environmental protection.

programme.title: 15th Meridian East - Similarity in Difference
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Sow, Harvest, Eat – Our Conservatory
programme.desc: This episode focuses on people from five countries who share a common passion: The production of their own food and food. What culinary treasures are hidden in the different regions, from Spitsbergen to Sweden, Austria, Poland and Chad?

programme.title: 15th Meridian East - Similarity in Difference
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 From Generation to Generation
programme.desc: The journey leads from the Norwegian Vesterålen to Chad, the Aeolian Islands and the Polish Giant Mountains. As different as the landscapes and cultures may be, all people are united in their love for their children and their desire to give something to tomorrows generation.

programme.title: 15th Meridian East - Similarity in Difference
programme.desc: What ideas are people on the 15th meridian east developing to shape the future and leave tomorrows generations a home worth living in? This consequence leads us to four future designers. From the barren Namib Desert to the glacier worlds of Spitsbergen, Sicily and the Croatian Mediterranean.

programme.title: Bear Essentials
programme.desc: We follow three young bears of different species – polar bears, brown bears and sloth bears (like Baloo, the Jungle Book Bear) – that inhabit dramatically varied landscapes as they find their way in the world. We look at how their mothers teach them the skills they need to survive and watch the many dangers they face. Their young lives are full of learning, moments of great tenderness and life-threatening drama. Over three years all of our bears, despite hardships and losses along the way, prove they have what it takes, they all have learned their bear essentials.

programme.title: Wild Moments
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Wild Moments: Dangerous and Deadly I
programme.desc: Wildlife film-makers often risk life and limb trying to capture unique images of their dangerous protagonists. In Alaska a cunning grizzly threatens the son of Andreas Kieling, on the remote Wrangel Island in northern-east Siberia his colleague Uwe Anders is taken by surprise by a a polar bear, and off the coast of South Africa a diving-team is unexpectedly surrounded by white sharks. But the life of the film-makers is also threatened by elemental forces, life-threatening diseases and failing technical equipment: Deep in the vast rainforests of West Africa cameraman Klaus Scheurich nearly dies of malaria, and in South India a film team narrowly escapes death in a hot-air balloon accident....

programme.title: Wild Moments
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Wild Moments: Dangerous and Deadly II
programme.desc: Wildlife filmmakers often risk life and limb trying to capture unique images of their dangerous protagonists. A cunning grizzly grabs a salmon off Andreas Kielings fishing rod, in the depths of the Amazon River a diving team has a spooky encounter with piranhas, in the Mediterranean Sea the currents nearly push Thomas Behrend into the mouths of angry sperm whales defending a newborn - and cameramen who want to film jaguars in the dense jungle of South America become easy prey for the well camouflaged cats. The life of the film-makers is also threatened by elemental forces and failing technical equipment: In the swamps of North Australia violent storms hold up the crossing of tearing...

programme.desc: A flurry of witnesses take the stand as the defense begins to build its case that O.J. Simpson did not kill Nicole Brown and Ron Goldman.

programme.title: OJ25
programme.desc: A gamble by the defense backfires when a fitness video made by O.J. Simpson within days of the murders is used to undermine their claim that he was too weak to commit the crime.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.sub-title: S01 : E43 Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Friends and family of Angie Zapata say she never hid from the men she dated that that she was a transgender woman.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.sub-title: S01 : E44 Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Sitcom star Rebecca Schaeffer was talented, pretty, and had her whole life ahead of her when she unknowingly opened the door of her Hollywood apartment to her killer Robert Bardo.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: A single mother in Saskatchewan visits a hospital in the midst of a panic attack.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: An aging hippy is going through bad times. His wife left him for a lesbian lover, taking their kids. His cancer, once in remission, has seemingly returned.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: Bored at home, a retiree takes a job at a 24-hour convenience store.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: A real estate broker doesnt return home. Her family cant find her. But police do - dead in a closet in her office.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: The phone rings in the middle of the night.

programme.title: OJ25
programme.desc: Blood evidence is presented by the defense to prove O.J. Simpsons innocence but that is overshadowed by the revelation that there is a tape of Mark Fuhrman using the N-word.

programme.title: OJ25

programme.desc: Mitch finds himself falling for an Italian actress who is being stalked by ruthless robbers.

programme.desc: Mitchs ex-wife flies in for a weekend visit and informs Mitch she is taking Hobie to Ohio.

programme.title: Race Against Time, Part 2

programme.title: Lovers Cove
programme.desc: Romance is in the air at Baywatch as Mitch and Jackies friendship grows more intense.

programme.title: Blindside

programme.title: Skyrider
programme.desc: Summer has love problems when Slade returns to discover Matt and Summer are dating.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 1

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 2
programme.desc: Mitch removes a bullet from an escaped convict, only to realize that he plans on killing him.

programme.title: Submersion
programme.desc: Mitch saves two boys from drowning. But when one ends up in a coma, Mitch suffers from PTSD.

programme.title: Ironman Buchannon
programme.desc: Mitchs birthday prompts him to train for an ironman competition, which causes problems at Baywatch.

programme.title: Tower of Power
programme.desc: A new lifeguard helps Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards confront an upsurge in gang activity.

programme.title: Second Time Around
programme.desc: Jesse, a beautiful motorcycle racer, returns and puts strain on Matt and Summer’s relationship.

programme.title: The Red Knights
programme.desc: An ad hoc reunion of elite 1950s lifeguards, the "Red Knights," triggers a bar room brawl.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 1
programme.desc: The Baywatch lifeguards travel to San Diego for a week where Summer is haunted by a ghost.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 2
programme.desc: Adrift in the ocean with his semi-conscious brother, Mitch struggles to keep them both alive.

programme.title: Mirror, Mirror
programme.desc: A beautiful woman and her plain sister compete for Mitchs affection with perilous results.

programme.title: The Falcon Manifesto
programme.desc: A reporter puts her life at risk to publish a story. Can the Baywatch team help her stay alive?

programme.title: Western Exposure
programme.desc: Country singer Jessie Lee Harris pays a visit to Baywatch in search of his estranged wife and son.

programme.title: The Life You Save

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Stephanie spends a week with the Coast Guard to help them crack a dangerous arms smuggling ring.

programme.title: Guys and Dolls
programme.desc: Matt doesnt know whose story to believe when he tries to reunite a runaway teen and her father.

programme.title: Rescue Bay
programme.desc: A Hollywood producer desperate for a new TV series idea observes a Baywatch rescue.

programme.title: Livin on the Fault, Part 2
programme.desc: Stephanie and the geological team are trapped underwater by a massive earthquake!

programme.title: Baja Run
programme.desc: John Cort shows up at headquarters and convinces Mitch to compete in a dune buggy race.

programme.title: Air Buchannon
programme.desc: Mitch has to work a 24-hour shift with Stephanie and Hobie is pressured into throwing a house party.

programme.title: Shortsighted

programme.title: Someone to Baywatch Over You

programme.title: K-Gas The Grooveyard of Solid Gold
programme.desc: The Baywatch team is put on high alert when thousands of reckless treasure hunters storm the beach.

programme.title: A Little Help From My Friends
programme.desc: Mitch is still mourning Tracy’s death, so Hobie seeks help from a radio show to help Mitch recover.

programme.title: Fathers Day
programme.desc: Mitch receives a mysterious package his father had put together before he died.

programme.title: Fire With Fire

programme.title: Deep Trouble
programme.desc: Matt and CJ stumble upon a homeless man who shockingly turns out to be someone they know very well.

programme.title: Heroes Dont Come Home

programme.title: Check Point
programme.desc: During a routine camp out, a local vagrant, a former marine discovers plans for an invasion in America.

programme.title: Fray
programme.desc: A young Marine veteran is facing a new battle back home while struggling through a shattered economy and burdened by the physical and emotional scars of war.

programme.title: Miles To Go
programme.desc: A writer from Los Angeles, who doesnt believe that relationships can last for him, struggles to mend his most recent failed relationship.

programme.title: Heart of Wilderness
programme.desc: On the run in the wilderness, Travis and Aimee navigate icy waters and the secrets they keep.

programme.title: The Boatman
programme.desc: A dedicated border coyote is haunted by the memories of those he failed to help.

programme.title: When We Last Spoke
programme.desc: Two abandoned sisters live with their grandparents in Texas in 1967.

programme.title: The Ribbon
programme.desc: Molly and Tim are happy newlyweds, but an unexpected miscarriage threatens to tear them apart until they meet Kristin, a pregnant homeless girl in need of a family.

programme.title: Bright Sky
programme.desc: A single mother escapes a dark past to a small town. As she begins to build a new life, she comes across an outlaw looking for redemption.

programme.title: The Surrogate
programme.desc: The Surrogate is a contemporary dramedy about a group of Bay Area friends in their early 40s navigating lifes messy moments together.

programme.title: Gold Fools

programme.title: TangerineLAnd

programme.title: Slaughter Is The Best Medicine

programme.title: Appleton

programme.title: A Murder of Innocence

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Movie

programme.title: I Remember You
programme.desc: Two strangers feel a supernatural connection after being involved in the same accident.

programme.title: Black Marigolds
programme.desc: Writer Ryan Cole and his Wife Kate go to an off season vacation house where he intends to finish his second novel. But their plans are changed by a devastating mental illness.

programme.title: Treasure Lies
programme.desc: Hardworking teenager Sean feels let down by life, but faces a crisis of character through a series of his own bad decisions.

programme.title: God and Salsa
programme.desc: A grief-stricken therapist determined to help a suicidal teen regains her faith in the process with the help of her Pastor and Salsa instructor.

programme.title: Who Will Move The Stone
programme.desc: A worldly Detroit lawyer decides to represent a Born Again Christian on trial for the murder of a Catholic Priest.

programme.title: Lucky Louie
programme.desc: A retired cop teams up with four ex-convicts and a behavioral science student to solve a fifty year old bank robbery in this new faith filled family comedy.

programme.title: Screened In
programme.desc: Peyton Hawthorne becomes disillusioned when she realizes her phone has taken over her life. She attempts to tackle her addiction but calamity ensues.

programme.title: In His Steps
programme.desc: When a homeless man interrupts the comfortable routine of First Church of Raymond, life will never be the same for the apathetic congregation.

programme.title: 6 Nonsmokers
programme.desc: Dr. Henry Caldwell, the world’s foremost mediator, faces the biggest challenge of his career when he takes on six roommates whose only thing in common is that none of them smoke.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Bandits
programme.desc: When bratty 5-year-old Byron Reed (Chris Williams) acts out the night before a family trip, his mother (Natasha Alam) makes him sit in the time out chair. When Byron awakens to an empty house, he assumes his wish to have no family has come true.

programme.title: Color Me You
programme.desc: A young womans family pressures her to attend law school and join their practice, but she continues to follow her dream to become a painter.

programme.title: 30-Love
programme.desc: This anti-wave sports film is a provocative and disturbing character study of a man struggling to navigate his grief.

programme.title: A Year And Change
programme.desc: After falling off the roof at a New Years Eve house party, Owen decides that its time to make some wholesale changes in his life.

programme.title: Arc: A Love Story
programme.desc: Lines are crossed and friendships tested when friends Ben and Naomi grow closer together amid a failed relationship and a broken marriage.

programme.title: The Dog Walker
programme.desc: A psychotic stalker forces a retired investigative journalist to solve a terrifying puzzle.

programme.title: The Wait
programme.desc: A mafia killer accepts to take the identity of his last victim in order to redeem his past. Two games of chess – one with his victim, the other with his boss – will stress the turning points of this change.

programme.title: Elephants
programme.desc: A true indie film through and through, Elephants takes an authentic look at a modern relationship in a "slice of life" style.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Witnesses of a car burglary assist an officer in locating the suspect. An officer investigates a fight involving a young man and a homeless gentleman. A suspect’s testimony is debunked after an eyewitness confirms that his knife wounds were self-inflicted.

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a vehicle traveling up to 100mph. An officer is dispatched to a larceny in progress at a convenience store. Dispatch informs officers that a man threatened an elderly woman.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are called when two intoxicated suspects decide to have some fun and vandalize a fence. Undercover officers set up a narcotics sting at a hotel. A man is found lying naked in a parking lot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call reporting an officer-involved fight. A brazen driver careens into a ditch after failing to yield. A berserk woman is pulled over for her erratic driving.

programme.sub-title: S13 : E17 Give Me My Money

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A deputy pursues a man who fled from a traffic stop. A deputy chases a suspicious man leaving an apartment complex. Two men claim they are trying sell a bike during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An extremely understanding cop gives a resistant suspect too many chances. A driver reminds us why we should never let a friend borrow our car. A man with a supped-up vehicle tells an awful lie to police.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers rescue a man from a rushing river. A suspect taunts officers during a slow-speed chase. Officers assist a rescue team with extraction from a car. An officer assists in an apartment fire.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A dispute inside a nightclub turns into a street fight. A man patrols his neighborhood ‘Old West’ style. A K-9 unit is called in to track a burglar on the run.

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a vehicle that struck a police car. Two men deny the lawnmower in their truck is stolen. Deputies are called when a mother attempts to run her daughter over.

programme.desc: Officers attempt to pull over a suspect reported having been involved in a car jacking. A suspect is caught in the act of burying a bag with illegal prescription drugs.

programme.desc: Officers assist an off-duty deputy being followed by a vehicle trying to force him off of the road. An officer responds to a domestic disturbance call involving a woman and her cheating husband.

programme.desc: Officers question a couple looking to score. Officers respond to a domestic violence call in which it is unclear what exactly transpired. Officers assist on a shots fired call.

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police use convenience store footage to make an arrest for burglary. Police attempt to help two neighbors reconcile their differences. Officers arrest a woman for domestic violence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A desperate driver is captured by officers after trying to flee on foot. Officers investigate a complaint regarding several intoxicated men soliciting themselves.

programme.desc: A man throws out his narcotics during a foot-chase with police. A woman is arrested for possession of drug paraphernalia. Officers call for back-up after a woman is held at knife-point.

programme.desc: A suspicious driver takes police on a neighborhood chase. Officers are called to capture a 12-foot python hiding outside a home. Officers suspect a funny walking motorist is hiding something in his shoe.

programme.desc: A resistant suspect thinks he sees monsters everywhere. Cops are forced to officiate a spousal wrestling match. Officers try to sort out where two motorists got their car and whose dope they possess.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E22 Four Legs Beats Two Legs
programme.desc: A suspect on a stolen motorcycle is apprehended with the assistance of the K-9 unit. An Officer responds to a domestic disturbance call after a woman "accidentally" stabs her boyfriend. A hazardous meth lab is busted.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An assailant attacks a woman after bumping into her. A woman is arrested for spilling beer on a cameraman’s equipment. Two intoxicated women are placed under arrest after a physical altercation.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies prevent the delivery of a pillow stuffed with drugs. A disabled woman calls the law when a father and son get into a fist fight. Deputies confront an intoxicated man riding a bike.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to a domestic dispute call resulting in an indecent arrest. Officers in Tennessee investigate a house known for drug activity. Officers in Southern California check in with a driver parked in a known drug hotbed.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A white-knuckled police chase ends in a dramatic escape and an unsettling officer injury. A woman spots an intoxicated prowler in a tree. Officers bring in the K-9 unit to sniff out a suspicious van.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E02 Who Let the Dogs Out
programme.desc: Officers deploy a police K-9 when a burglary suspect takes refuge in a lemon tree. A suspect on the run seeks shelter in a stranger’s house. A biker with a suspended license just doesn’t know how to listen.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A sizable amount of cocaine is seized during a routine search. An officer responds to a domestic dispute call with conflicting stories. An officer’s patrol car is nearly struck by a train.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E11 A Song of Fire and Cleaning
programme.desc: The pursuit of a criminal driver ends in a fire and police rescue. Police track down an elusive suspect. A family dispute over cleaning a garage ends with the police being called.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer coordinates a reverse prostitution sting to capture suspects who solicit prostitutes. An inebriated man is detained until he sobers up. Officers stop a stolen vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A prostitute tries to outrun the police during a foot chase. A man claims he can only meet women at motels since he lives with his mom. A prostitute fresh out of jail protests that he’s not trying to return to his old career.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call of a naked man inside a school. A woman being questioned by Police is oblivious to her wardrobe malfunction. Officers on patrol order several female nude sunbathers to cover up.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An attempted pull over results in a foot chase and eventual arrest. An officer makes a drug-related arrest during a routine traffic stop. An officer makes a sizeable drug seizure during a field sobriety check.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A driver bails out of his vehicle after an attempted traffic stop, the suspect is ultimately tased and arrested. An officer assists with a fight call on the Las Vegas Strip. A Florida man is arrested after an unlikely story is deemed inaccurate.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E03 I Wont Be There for You
programme.desc: A suspect foolishly tries to elude police in a bright yellow sports car. Roommates aren’t always there for each other when police are called to break up a fight. No one in a stopped vehicle wants to admit to ownership of contraband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers recover a small bag of drugs from a crying suspect. A drunk woman hides a second ID in her back pocket. Police stop a vehicle that hit a patrol car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers give chase to a suspect on a bike. The passenger of a vehicle is arrested for possession. Police are given a classic "Im holding it for a friend" excuse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E03 Gas up and Run!
programme.desc: A man is tasered twice after struggling with two deputies. A gas station fight ends in a foot chase. A deputy pulls over a pair of quarreling lovers after they run a stop sign.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies pursue a truck with a trailer full of golf carts. Police question a driver after finding a mask and handgun in his car. Officers are called to a traffic collision involving a semi and an SUV.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A patrolman plays linebacker when a fleeing thief runs right into him. Armed-robbery victims give a colorful play-by-play on surveillance footage of the crime. Officers have to get tearful children back to their estranged mother.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E16 We Run the Show
programme.desc: A stealthy robbery suspect leads officers on a chase through backyards. After dropping a bag of meth, a man swears he’s only seen the drug on TV. A doped-up domestic violence suspect tries to claim self-defense.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a truck driving backwards on a freeway. A suspect jumps a train to evade police. A woman claims to be disabled when a pill falls from her pocket.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A jaywalker with no ID bolts away from an officer. A man mixes illicit items with his pizza. A woman involved in a domestic violence call blames her monthly issues.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect is arrested after officers find a loaded gun during a routine search. Two men are detained after suspected of battery. Officers arrest a man pick-pocketing during Mardi Gras.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Despite driving a large SUV and trailer, a suspect tries to outrun the police. A driver tries to hide contraband on his person. Police are called into a domestic dispute involving a husband and wife.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Undercover Vice Officers pose as drug dealers in an illegal drug transaction. A man is pulled over and arrested for driving a stolen vehicle. Three men are caught robbing a coin machine.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man stages a sit-in in his car in an attempt to stop it from being towed. A homeowner denies that he’s selling drugs despite the large amount of evidence found in his home. A safe full of evidence is found during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman claims a man abused her then put a curse on her. Police arrest a man for having illegal drugs on him. An elderly woman locks herself in the restroom at a bank.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A high speed chase comes to a halt in a residential area and the driver is taken in for sobriety testing. A suspicious vehicle takes off as an officer approaches and a high speed chase ensues. An officer pulls over a vehicle belonging to a battery suspect who attempts to eat evidence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers arrest a female driver for drug possession and whose mother scolds her before she’s carted off to jail. An officer arrests a man who alleges that he’s waiting for his date for outstanding warrants and a stolen vehicle. An officer takes a known prostitute to jail.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers engage in a high-speed pursuit of a stolen vehicle. Police spot a motel fire, alert the guests and contact the Fire Department. Officers pursue a suspect on a stolen motorcycle.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On May 17th 2005, a body is discovered in a forest of Sucy-en-Brie; Christophe Belle, 40 years old, a renowned pastry cook.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The disturbing missing case in Paris of a four year old.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On October 13th 1996, the body of young Angelique Dumetz, 18 years old, is recovered down a ditch in Oise forest. An important clue is found on the crime scene.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On February 23th 2017, policemen are alerted of the disapearrance of Brigitte Troadec, her husband Pascal, and their children Sebastien and Charlotte.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Night of Horror at Devils Plateau (Marie-Jeanne Meyer Case) - On June 18, 2011, Marie-Jeanne Meyer, 17-years old, waved goodbye to her little sister before leaving for her daily jog on the heights of Tournon in Ardèche. She never came back. Three days later, her mutilated body was found in a freshly dug pit, near an area known to be cursed, "The Devils Plateau." Whats more, the crime scene looked like a mystical ritual ... Was it a ritual murder? Revenge? An unfortunate encounter? ...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Mysterious Murder at the Farm (Valerie Bary Case)- On Friday, March 26, 2004, in the region of Dijon, Laurent Bary came home from his work to discover the lifeless body of his wife, Valerie, bathing in a pool of blood. According to the investigators initial findings, the 38-year-old nurses aid had been stabbed several times, seeming to validate the theory of a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 13, 2011, two boaters retrieved a suitcase that was floating in the bay of Lorient. Inside, they discovered the tied up corpse of a man.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Bloody Christmas next to the Leman lake (CASE OF RUTH LÉGERET) - On January 4, 2006, Ruth Legeret was found dead in the middle of a pool of blood at her luxurious property in Vevey, Switzerland. Next to her was the lifeless body of her friend, Marina Studer. Who could have killed these two simple and wealthy widows? Clue after clue, the Swiss polices investigation would revolve around an environment of family jealousy and financial greed.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: September 16 2005. The lifeless body of Audrey Jouannet, 24, is found hidden under the bed in her small apartment in Soisy-sur-Seine. It soon becomes apparent that the young woman has been tortured at length before being strangled. But surprisingly, though the highly meticulous murderer has taken care to leave no sign of his passage, the autopsy reveals traces of sperm on the victim. It will take all of the investigators intuition to pierce the mystery of this heinous crime...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Sylvain Dromard finds the body of his wife Laurence lying in a pool of blood in the kitchen. The crime was particularly violent and the theory of a burglary that went wrong is soon excluded. But investigators dont understand who could want the adorable hairdresser of Saint-Martin-dAblois dead. During the investigation, the work of profilers will enable them to draw a very precise portrait of the murderer...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: After an ordinary dinner, Pierre and Gabrielle Labrell suffer severe abdominal pains.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Nelly Cremel, 39, leaves her home to go jogging... never to return. Eight days later, after a vast search campaign, her body is found. Theres no doubt that its murder. The case soon ignites public opinion, even inflaming passions at the highest level of the state. The clues lead investigators on a number of trails, from the shadows of the French secret service to a manhunt for a possible sex maniac, in a case of murder most foul.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Willy Pomonti, a retired architect, is found savagely murdered in his opulent villa in La Celle-Saint-Cloud, near Paris. It soon becomes clear that the man has been tortured prior to death. At several points during this extraordinary enquiry, police will feel theyre holding the culprit... It will take them ten years to finally shed light on this particularly violent crime.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The lifeless body of Christophe Lejard is found by his son just metres from their home. The man was shot in the head as he was getting into his car to go to work. A veritable execution, which at first glance doesnt square with the profile of the quiet family man. Yet behind the appearances, the investigation gradually reveals all the hate and resentment that revolved around the victim.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A man walks into a gendarmerie near Saint-Malo to report that his wife has been missing since the previous day. The couple are going through a divorce, but this mother would never have left her seven children alone! An extensive search is undertaken but the woman cannot be found. What has happened to Adeline Piet? The investigation spans several years and experiences many twists.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The corpse of Priscillia Ciatti, 14, is discovered by the side of a field, a few hundred metres from her family home. The teenager has been stabbed sixty times with a knife and -an extra sordid detail - a devil mask is found next to her body. Was Priscillia the victim of a prowler? A serial killer? A maniac inspired by a horror movie? Investigators soon find that the young girl felt she was being watched, and even threatened...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: In the early hours of the morning, Mathilde Croguennec, 18, attending "Teknival" in Brittany, is found at the foot of a tree with her throat cut. Investigators face the task of finding the killer from among the 43,000 participants of this huge open-air festival of electronic music, where drink and drugs are consumed in abundance. An unusual investigation that leads the police down a number of false avenues.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Arriving at her work, the secretary of a small firm in the suburbs of Geneva finds the body of Jean-Raymond Blatti, the companys new accountant. The man is lying in a pool of blood and, on his belly, the murderer has written "DIRTY RAPIST". Yet Jean-Raymond Blatti was never charged with sexual assault. Over the course of the investigation, this inscription will appear as one of the many mysteries of this case which is particularly rich in twists and turns.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 19th 2004, the naked and tied up body of a woman is recovered in the Ourcq canal in Fresnes-sur-Marne. The victim is impossible to identify.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On April 3th 2003, Chantal Ternik, a 48 year old housewife, is discovered hanged in her house of Sanary-sur-Mer, in Var.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On March 28th 2013, the burnt body of Anne Barbot, 38 years old, is discovered in a forest of Maine-et-Loire.

programme.title: Invisible Impacts
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they shine a light on the unseen science behind our everyday lives. This week’s experiments explore the resonant frequencies of bridges and human bodies.

programme.title: Water, Water Everywhere
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they dive deep into the wonderful world of water. In this week’s experiments we discover how water can start a fire, transform breakfast cereal into a magnetic field detector, and even change the way you visualize the world around you.

programme.title: Magnificent Mixtures
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they amalgamate in the name of science. In this week’s experiments we mix up some fireworks made from tin foil, whip up a stinky polymer, and try out an alchemy staple - turning lead into gold.

programme.title: Up and Atom
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they break open the atomic bonds that connect our world. This week’s experiments blow open the science behind creating a glowing pickle, how forensic teams extract DNA, and how acids can transform simple household items to their core.

programme.title: Hot Hot Heat
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they turn up the thermostat and discover the role heat plays in science. This week’s experiments investigate how to send secret messages with heat.

programme.title: Explosive Elements
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests discover the unstable world of elemental gasses. This week’s experiments include recreating a big bang with lithium, the incendiary power of methane, and how a little bit of liquified nitrogen can lend a lot of power to a rocket.

programme.title: Colorful Conundrums
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they taste the scientific rainbow. This week’s experiments highlight how electricity can tint titanium, how you can create a color wheel by lighting things on fire, and why the world gets all its colors from white light.

programme.title: Dont Believe Your Eyes
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they make science look like sorcery. This week’s experiments delve into the possibilities of mind control, why objects and people tend to sync together, and the magical mysteries behind magnesium.

programme.title: The Sound of Science
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they tune into the science behind sound. This week’s experiments hit high notes as we discover the physics of theremins, investigate how the outer ear impacts human hearing, and put on a laser show with cymatics.

programme.title: Science on Fire
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they kindle our curiosity about the science behind fire. This week’s experiments investigate how you can burn metal using only a 9 volt battery, what fire can teach us about calories, and why a little bit of sodium can cause a gigantic explosion.

programme.title: Invisible Impacts
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they shine a light on the unseen science behind our everyday lives. This week’s experiments explore the resonant frequencies of bridges and human bodies.

programme.title: Water, Water Everywhere
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they dive deep into the wonderful world of water. In this week’s experiments we discover how water can start a fire, transform breakfast cereal into a magnetic field detector, and even change the way you visualize the world around you.

programme.title: Magnificent Mixtures
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they amalgamate in the name of science. In this week’s experiments we mix up some fireworks made from tin foil, whip up a stinky polymer, and try out an alchemy staple - turning lead into gold.

programme.title: First Steps to Mars
programme.desc: Humans seem to be on the cusp of reaching Mars, but how did we get to this point?

programme.title: Surviving Mars
programme.desc: Science may soon make the dream of traveling to Mars a reality, but how will we live once we get there?

programme.title: First Martians
programme.desc: Sometime in the future humans will leave Earth to colonize Mars, and in doing so will begin to adapt to life on another planet in surprising ways.

programme.title: Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places
programme.desc: Commander Stephen Hawking pilots his space ship the SS Hawking on the journey of a lifetime, zooming from black holes to the Big Bang, Saturn to Santa Barbara.

programme.title: Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places 3
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places
programme.desc: Commander Stephen Hawking and his space ship the SS Hawking encounter an alien A.I., then race to the edge of the universe, and plunge into an alternate Earth.

programme.title: Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places
programme.desc: Commander Stephen Hawking takes another journey in his space ship, the SS Hawking, this time to Venus, the Sun and out to the Eagle Nebula.

programme.title: Destination: Pluto Beyond The Flyby
programme.desc: Join the New Horizons team to examine the latest findings and imagery from Pluto and the fringes of our solar system. They reveal a world unlike any other weve seen yet!

programme.title: Miniverse
programme.desc: Join astronaut Chris Hadfield, along with hitchhikers Michio Kaku (and others) on a joyride across our Solar System, scaled down to the size of the continental US.

programme.title: Return to the Moon
programme.desc: The Apollo equipment has sat abandoned on the lunar surface for over 40 years. Now there is a renewed excitement and drive to return to the moon.

programme.title: First Steps to Mars
programme.desc: Humans seem to be on the cusp of reaching Mars, but how did we get to this point?

programme.title: Surviving Mars
programme.desc: Science may soon make the dream of traveling to Mars a reality, but how will we live once we get there?

programme.title: First Martians
programme.desc: Sometime in the future humans will leave Earth to colonize Mars, and in doing so will begin to adapt to life on another planet in surprising ways.

programme.title: Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places
programme.desc: Commander Stephen Hawking pilots his space ship the SS Hawking on the journey of a lifetime, zooming from black holes to the Big Bang, Saturn to Santa Barbara.

programme.title: Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places 3
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places
programme.desc: Commander Stephen Hawking and his space ship the SS Hawking encounter an alien A.I., then race to the edge of the universe, and plunge into an alternate Earth.

programme.title: Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Stephen Hawkings Favorite Places
programme.desc: Commander Stephen Hawking takes another journey in his space ship, the SS Hawking, this time to Venus, the Sun and out to the Eagle Nebula.

programme.title: Destination: Pluto Beyond The Flyby
programme.desc: Join the New Horizons team to examine the latest findings and imagery from Pluto and the fringes of our solar system. They reveal a world unlike any other weve seen yet!

programme.title: Miniverse
programme.desc: Join astronaut Chris Hadfield, along with hitchhikers Michio Kaku (and others) on a joyride across our Solar System, scaled down to the size of the continental US.

programme.title: Return to the Moon
programme.desc: The Apollo equipment has sat abandoned on the lunar surface for over 40 years. Now there is a renewed excitement and drive to return to the moon.

programme.title: The Stage Is Set
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 4th and Forever: Muck City
programme.desc: A native son is named head football coach at legendary Pahokee High School, and a budding quarterback looks to make his father proud.

programme.title: A Rocky Start
programme.desc: A coach faces a backlash after an embarrassing season opener, and players get a major boost both on and off the field.

programme.title: Tensions Mount
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 4th and Forever: Muck City
programme.desc: Coach Boldin confronts his coaching staff about sensitive information leaking to fans, while a crew of Pahokee players scouts their arch-rivals.

programme.title: A Muck Homecoming
programme.desc: A beloved teacher struggles with cancer, an unsung academic talent emerges, and an all-around player switches positions and dominates the game.

programme.title: Rabbit Hunt
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 4th and Forever: Muck City
programme.desc: The annual sugar cane burn gives current players a chance to “Rabbit Hunt,” and one former player a chance to lobby for a greener future.

programme.title: Devastating Blow
programme.desc: On the eve of the Muck Bowl, an eligibility issue deals Glades Central’s playoff hopes a serious setback, sparking tension between coaching staffs.

programme.title: Muck Bowl: Last Team Standing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 4th and Forever: Muck City
programme.desc: A tragic act casts a dark cloud over the Muck. A last-second score catapults one team to a surprising playoff run, while a loss spells the end for the coach of the other.

programme.title: There Can Be Only One
programme.desc: A last-second score catapults one team to a surprising playoff run, while a heartbreaking loss spells the end for the coach of the other.

programme.title: Part 1: Rise of Civilization
programme.desc: In the region that includes the Mediterranean, the Aegean, Mesopotamia and Egypt, the Bronze Age arrived about 3000 BC and lasted nearly 2000 years. What singled out this period and the new societies and cities that emerged? The development of formal writing is one among several important factors.

programme.title: Part 2: Masters Of Trade
programme.desc: Trade, and in particular trade in luxury goods, drove the commerce economies of the Bronze Age. This is the time when the first super powers in history, Egypt and Mesopotamia, emerge and dominate the "world" stage of the Mediterranean and Aegean seas and surrounding areas.

programme.title: Part 3: Conquest And Collapse
programme.desc: The Bronze Age had the first large urban centers, powerful kingdoms and armies, writing, and trade routes across vast areas. What led to the collapse of the city-state entities and the end of the Bronze Age? Possibly a perfect storm of uncontrollable factors that are still being researched.

programme.title: Pierce Arrow
programme.desc: 1913 38C Brougham - "built up to a standard, not down to a price" - was worth the value of several houses at the time, with the special cachet of being the first car owned by the White House.

programme.title: Duesenberg
programme.desc: The 1930 Model J Duesenberg was the pinnacle of automotive engineering in power and speed, holding records not surpassed until the 1960s.

programme.title: Terraplane
programme.desc: The Hudson Terraplane 1937 Series 72 was a fast and affordable car with unique style and innovative design. The company, unlike others, survived the Depression.

programme.title: Corvette
programme.desc: The 1963 Split-Window Stingray Coupe combined power, performance, precision and youthful design.

programme.title: Oldsmobile
programme.desc: The Oldsmobile F88 was a "dream car" of the GM Oldsmobile line, but the auto, despite its sophisticated, debonair styling, was destined never to see production.

programme.title: Mustang
programme.desc: The Ford Mustang Shelby GT-500 was born of the 1960s vibe and the racing experience of Carroll Shelby, who set speed records at Bonnevile salt flats.

programme.title: The Hunt for the Slave Ship Guerrero
programme.desc: A team of underwater archeologists searches for the remains of the Guerrero, an illegal slave ship sunk in battle off the coast of Florida.

programme.title: The Last Persian Shah
programme.desc: Shah Mohammad Reza Pahlavi would have been 100 years in October 2019. The Shahs story begins with good ideas and ideals and ends in bloody chaos.

programme.title: Radioactive Forest - 10 Years After
programme.desc: We look at the satoyama landscape ten years after the nuclear disaster at Fukushima Daiichi Power Plant which was followed by the 3.11 megaquake.

programme.title: Hitlers Dealer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: Munich, 2013 a giant haul of missing masterpieces were found. Gurlitt was the man behind it. His fathers job was to purchase works for Hitler for the Fuhrermuseum.

programme.title: Faberge Eggs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: Each year Carl Faberge made one of a kind Easter egg for the Tsars family. When Carl fled Russia during the revolution, 8 of these priceless Imperial Eggs went missing.

programme.title: Vincent Van Gogh
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: When Van Gogh died, he was a complete unknown, his paintings fetching under 10 dollars. So how did his works become some of the most revered and expensive in the world?

programme.title: Monuments Men
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: During WWII the Nazis plundered some of the worlds greatest artworks as they tore across Europe. We find out how the Allies tracked them down.

programme.title: Leonardo da Vinci
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: The story of the theft of the Mona Lisa in 1911 from the Louvre and how Pablo Picasso was accused of the crime.

programme.title: Vermeer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: The Dutch didnt appreciate what they had. For 200 years Vermeer was completely forgotten.

programme.title: Palo Alto
programme.desc: April on lukioikainen tytto, jonka arkea rytmittaa koulun lisaksi jalkapallotreenit ja kavereiden jarjestamat bileet. Varautuneen ja hiljaisen ulkokuoren alle katkeytyy haaveilijasielu, jonka aani ei aina kantaudu hottoisan aidin tai eksentrisen isapuolen korviin. Romanssin ontuessa lukiokaveri Teddyyn kipina tuntuu kuitenkin loytyvan Aprilin ja taman jalkapallovalmentajan yhteisista hetkista.

programme.title: Black Coal, Thin Ice
programme.desc: Pohjois-Kiinassa vuonna 1999 eraassa pikkukaupungissa loydetaan useita ruumiita. Kaksi poliisivirkailijaa kuolee ja yksi loukkaantuu vakavasti verisessa yhteenotossa, kun epailtya murhaajaa yritetaan ottaa kiinni. Eloon jaanyt poliisi Zhang Zili joutuu luopumaan virastaan ja loytaa tyopaikan tehtaan vartijana. Viisi vuotta myohemmin tapahtuu jalleen useita mysteerisia murhia. Entinen kollega apunaan Zhang alkaa itse tutkia tapausta. Palkitun ohjaajan Diao Yinanin kolmas elokuva on film noir -trilleri, jonka paaosissa esiintyvat Fan Liao, Lun Mei Gwei ja Xuebing Wang. Elokuva voitti vuoden 2014 Berliinin elokuvajuhlien Kultaisen karhun ja Hopeisen karhun.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Finding Altamira
programme.desc: Maria on pikkuvanha tytto, joka ei muuta halua kuin tulla arkeologiksi kuten isansa Marcelino. He tutkivat yhdessa paikallista Altamiran luolaa ja loytavat muinaisia luolamaalauksia, jotka kuvaavat harkia ja ihmiselaman eri muotoja.

programme.title: Laitakaupungin valot
programme.desc: Laitakaupungin valot kertoo yovartijana tyoskentelevasta Koistisesta, joka joutuu petoksen uhriksi. Laitakaupungin valot oli mukana vuoden 2006 Cannesin elokuvajuhlien kansainvalisessa kilpasarjassa. Elokuva palkittiin parhaan elokuvan Jussi-palkinnolla vuonna 2007. Lisaksi Timo Salminen voitti Jussin parhaasta kuvauksesta ja Markku Patila parhaasta lavastuksesta.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Gus Van Santin viimeisin elokuva tuo ohjaajan jalleen yhteen Will Hunting -menestyselokuvansa tahden ja kasikirjoittajan Matt Damonin kanssa. Ajankohtaista draamaa tahdittavat lisaksi Frances McDormand, John Krasinski ja Rosemarie DeWitt. Matt Damon esittaa ison energiayhtion kauppamiesta joka lupaa kylan asukkaille vapautuksen koyhyydesta, jos asukkaat suostuvat maalampopumppujen rakennuttamiseen. Vahitellen toimenpiteen riskit alkavat paljastua…

programme.title: Main Street
programme.desc: Pohjois-Carolinassa sijaitsevan pikkukaupungin kuviot menevat uusiksi, kun kaupunkiin muuttaa karismaattinen muukalainen. Han suunnittelee kuolevan kaupungin elvyttamista, mutta suunnitelmat eivat ole kaikkien asukkaiden mieleen. Ainakaan mikaan ei palaa enaa ennalleen...

programme.title: JFK - Avoin tapaus
programme.desc: New Orleansin piirisyyttaja Jim Garrison ottaa tehtavakseen tutkia presidentti John F. Kennedyn murhaa Dallasissa, Texasissa vuonna 1963. Se, mita han saa selville, saa hanet epailemaan, etta tarinassa on muutakin kuin julkisuuden versio.

programme.title: Hakutulokset (Birdman)
programme.desc: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) on musta komedia paluuta tekevasta nayttelijasta (Michael Keaton), joka on jaanyt kuuluisan supersankarihahmonsa vangiksi. Kiinnityksen saaminen uskottavaksi Broadway-nayttelijaksi ei ole helppoa, ja nayttelija paatyy ryhtymaan ohjaajaksi.

programme.title: Varg
programme.desc: Varg on elamaa suurempi tarina Ruotsin ja Norjan rajalla asuvasta Klemensista (Peter Stomare) ja taman sisarenpojasta, Nejlasta.

programme.title: Griffin and Phoenix
programme.desc: Kun Griffin saa kuulla, etta hanella on kuolemaan johtava sairaus, han paattaa ottaa kohtalonsa omiin kasiinsa ja elaa taysilla loppuun asti. Han tapaa Phoenixin ja aikaa myoten rakastuu tahan, mutta myos Phoenixilla on salaisuus...

programme.title: Candy
programme.desc: Candy (Abbie Cornish) ja Dan (Heath Ledger) rakastavat toisiaan ja heroiinia, joka tuntuu vain lisaavan heidan keskinaista onneaan. Mikaan ei voi menna pieleen, kunhan heilla on toisensa. Avioliitto ja lapsi vain lujittavat sidetta. Mutta vahitellen harmiton tapa saa yliotteen ja uhkaa tuhota pienen paratiisin. Candyn vanhemmat ja Danin ystava Casper (Geoffrey Rush) alkavat menettaa toivonsa pariskunnan vajotessa yha syvemmalle omaan rakkauden ja heroiinin savyttamaan maailmaansa...

programme.title: Undergods
programme.desc: Mustalla huumorilla viimeistelty scifidystopia maailmasta, jossa vain harva on selvinnyt ja selviytyjistakin jokainen on omalla tavallaan vahan rikki. Kafkamainen miljoo yhdistettyna 2020-luvun romahtaneisiin unelmiin saa jo itsessaan katsojan ihon kananlihalle. Elokuva alkaa, kun kaksi ruumiinkeraajaa kiertelee pitkin autioituneita katuja ja kertoilee tyonsa lomassa romuttuneista haaveistaan, jotka ajoivat heidat tahan kolkkoon nykyhetkeen.

programme.title: This is England
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu 1980-luvun Englantiin, jossa Falklandin sotaan lahetetaan jatkuvasti lisaa sotilaita ja kansallismieliset saavat jalansijaa tyovaenluokkaisten tyottomien keskuudessa. Skan ja Oi-punkin kannattajat jakautuvat musiikin ystaviin ja skineihin. Taman kaiken keskella 12-vuotias Shaun loytaa skinijengin kanssa yhteisen savelen.

programme.title: Kohtalokas Syrjahyppy (Unfaithful)
programme.desc: Edward ja Connie Sumner ovat keski-ikainen pariskunta, jotka elavat amerikkalaista unelmaa New Yorkin esikaupunkialueella. Naennaisesti onnellisesti naimisissa olevien Sumnerien, joilla on kahdeksanvuotias poika, koira ja taloudenhoitaja, hiljainen maailma murtuu, kun satunnainen kohtaaminen muukalaisen kanssa vetaa Connien suhteeseen, joka voisi merkita enemman kuin vain avioliiton paattymista. KOHTALOKAS SYRJÄHYPPY on eroottinen trilleri syyllisyydesta ja raivosta, joka kysyy vaikeimpia kysymyksia kaikista suhteista.

programme.title: Danny Collins
programme.desc: Al Pacino esittaa ikaantyvaa 1970-luvun rokkaria Danny Collinsia, joka ei osaa luopua rankasta elamantyylistaan. Kun hanen managerinsa loytaa John Lennonin toimittamatta jaaneen kirjeen Collinsille neljankymmenen vuoden takaa, Collins paattaa muuttaa elamansa ja lahtee riipaisevalle matkalle etsimaan perhettaan, rakkautta ja uutta mahdollisuutta. Elokuvan upean soundtrackin helmina kuullaan John Lennonin lauluja.

programme.title: In Tranzit
programme.desc: Toisen maailmansodan paatyttya joukko saksalaisia sotavankeja lahetetaan leningradilaiselle vankileirille. Leirin naistyontekijat vihaavat heidan miehensa ja poikansa tappaneita saksalaisia yli kaiken ja valmistautuvat nyt kostoon.

programme.title: Dinner Rush
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu Manhattanille, Louis Cropan omistamaan ravintola Gigino Trattoriaan. Louis Cropan poika Udo toimii ravintolan paakokkina, ja on onnistunut saavuttamaan ravintolalle mainetta kokkaustaidoillaan. Louis Cropa ei kuitenkaan ole iloinen aikaisemmin perinteista kotiruokaa tarjoilleen trattoriansa muuttumisesta yhdeksi New Yorkin trendikkaimmista ravintoloista. Omistajan elamantilannetta ei helpota sekaan, etta hanen liikekumppaninsa on vasta vahan aikaan sitten murhattu, ja hanen suojatikseen ottamansa ravintolan apukokki Duncan karsii pahasta peliriippuvuudesta.

programme.title: Griffin and Phoenix
programme.desc: Kun Griffin saa kuulla, etta hanella on kuolemaan johtava sairaus, han paattaa ottaa kohtalonsa omiin kasiinsa ja elaa taysilla loppuun asti. Han tapaa Phoenixin ja aikaa myoten rakastuu tahan, mutta myos Phoenixilla on salaisuus...

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Vuonna 1961 Neuvostoliiton ensimmainen ydinsukellusvene lahtee ensimmaiselle matkalleen Pohjois-Atlantille. Mutta sukellusvene ei toimi optimaalisesti, ja koska ydinreaktorissa ilmenee ongelmia, silla on katastrofaaliset seuraukset miehistoon. Miehiston on taisteltava yhdessa ydinkatastrofin valttamiseksi, joka on seka hengenvaarallinen etta voi aloittaa uuden maailmansodan suurvaltojen valilla.

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: Elokuva perustuu tositapahtumaan kahden vaikutusvaltaisen miehen tapaamisesta. Heidan filosofiansa ja nakemyksensa maansa tulevaisuudesta olivat hyvin erilaiset. Eletaan vaarallista aikaa, kun sota Balkanilla oli voitettu, natsit kukistettu ja puna-armeija oli lahella. Miesten valinen keskustelu muokkasi maailmaa.

programme.title: Boys on the Side
programme.desc: Vauhdikkaassa komediassa kolme naista tekee vahingossa rikoksen ja joutuu lahtemaan karkuteille. Naiset lahtevat taipaleelle koko maan halki, ja matkan aikana he kokevat jotain heille ennalta tuntematonta: yhteenkuuluvuuden tunnetta ja ystavyytta.

programme.title: Kesahetket (Summer Hours)
programme.desc: Helène on suvun matriarkka, joka on omistanut elamansa taiteen ja antiikkiesineiden keraamiselle. Kun hanen elamansa lopulta paattyy, hanen kolme lastaan saavat suuren perinnon kauniin vanhan maalaistalon ja kaiken siihen kuuluvan muodossa, mutta lapset ovat kaikkea muuta kuin yhta mielta siita, miten perintokohteita tulisi hallita. Kesahetket on Kultainen palmu -voittaja Olivier Assayasin vakeva perhedraama, jonka rooleissa nahdaan Juliette Binoche, Charles Berling ja Jeremie Renier.

programme.title: Black Coal, Thin Ice
programme.desc: Pohjois-Kiinassa vuonna 1999 eraassa pikkukaupungissa loydetaan useita ruumiita. Kaksi poliisivirkailijaa kuolee ja yksi loukkaantuu vakavasti verisessa yhteenotossa, kun epailtya murhaajaa yritetaan ottaa kiinni. Eloon jaanyt poliisi Zhang Zili joutuu luopumaan virastaan ja loytaa tyopaikan tehtaan vartijana. Viisi vuotta myohemmin tapahtuu jalleen useita mysteerisia murhia. Entinen kollega apunaan Zhang alkaa itse tutkia tapausta. Palkitun ohjaajan Diao Yinanin kolmas elokuva on film noir -trilleri, jonka paaosissa esiintyvat Fan Liao, Lun Mei Gwei ja Xuebing Wang. Elokuva voitti vuoden 2014 Berliinin elokuvajuhlien Kultaisen karhun ja Hopeisen karhun.

programme.title: Koston liekki
programme.desc: Rankasti ryyppaava, loppuunpalanut CIA:n agentti John Creasy (Denzel Washington) on luopunut toivosta elamansa suhteen – kunnes hanet palkataan yhdeksanvuotiaan Pita Ramosin (Dakota Fanning) henkivartijaksi. Pala palalta Creasyn sisin alkaa eheytya, mutta kun Pita kidnapataan, paasee Creasyn tukahdutettu raivo valloilleen eika han pysahdy ennen kuin teko on kostettu. Loppuun asti.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Camp X-Ray kertoo nuoresta naisesta, joka liittyy Yhdysvaltain armeijaan ollakseen osa jotain itseaan ja pikkukaupunkinsa juuria suurempaa. Han paatyy kuitenkin vartijaksi Guantanamo Bayhin, missa han solmii ystavyyssuhteen yhden vangin kanssa. Eettisia kysymyksia pohtiessaan naiden kahden eri lahtokohdista tulleen ihmisen ystavyys muuttaa heidan molempien elaman.

programme.title: Laitakaupungin valot
programme.desc: Laitakaupungin valot kertoo yovartijana tyoskentelevasta Koistisesta, joka joutuu petoksen uhriksi. Laitakaupungin valot oli mukana vuoden 2006 Cannesin elokuvajuhlien kansainvalisessa kilpasarjassa. Elokuva palkittiin parhaan elokuvan Jussi-palkinnolla vuonna 2007. Lisaksi Timo Salminen voitti Jussin parhaasta kuvauksesta ja Markku Patila parhaasta lavastuksesta.

programme.title: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: Hortense Cumberbatch on keskiluokkainen lontoolainen ja menestyksekas optikko. Adoptioaitinsa kuoleman jalkeen han paattaa etsia biologisia juuriaan. Tummaihoinen Hortense yllattyy suuresti saadessaan selville, etta hanen biologinen aitinsa on valkoinen yhteiskunnan laitamille ajautunut tyolaisnainen. Uuden perheensa kanssa vietetty aika muuttaa Hortensea pysyvasti. Salaisuuksia ja valheita kahmi huikeat viisi Oscar-ehdokkuutta, ja se on yksi Mike Leighn menestyksekkaimpia elokuvia. Se palkittiin Cannesin Kultaisella palmulla, Golden Globella ja kolmella Baftalla.
