programme.title: The Harder Terry Falls
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S6 - "The Harder Terry Falls"
programme.desc: Dust off your chaps as Terry tests several things from the epic western The Harder They Fall, and a canteen buster test from Gunsmoke!

programme.title: Croatia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Running the World S1 - "Croatia"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to Croatia to meet up with local parkour experts and undertake an epic run in an abandoned aluminium factory.

programme.title: Santorini
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Running the World S1 - "Santorini"
programme.desc: A challenge to race each other and a labyrinth of narrow streets and hidden passages to navigate will make this one of the trickiest challenges.

programme.title: Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Los Angeles"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie goes to Hollywood arriving in a million dollar V12 Ferrari. In the ‘City of Angels’ Alex is brought into contact with the Brotherhood of Racing, a community of drivers looking to create safe racing conditions for amateurs.

programme.title: Houston
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Houston"
programme.desc: Given special access to a 2 million dollar exclusive McClaren Senna, Supercar Blondie digs under the surface to uncover gang feuds in the SLAB (Slow, Low and Bangin’) community and meets up with legendary hip hop artists Slim Thug and Paul Wall.

programme.title: Peak District and Derbyshire
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Epic Trails S2 - "Peak District and Derbyshire"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson heads to the Peak District in England, to tackle the 268-mile Pennine Way—Britain’s oldest and most challenging National Trail.

programme.title: Juneau, Alaska
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Epic Trails S2 - "Juneau, Alaska"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson heads deep into the backcountry to explore the mountains, glaciers and wildlife around Alaska’s capital city of Juneau.

programme.title: The Gift of Community
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Kindness Diaries S2 - "The Gift of Community"
programme.desc: Leon crashes and is stranded on the icy Yukon roads. He is invited to a party where one man opens his home to countless refugees.

programme.title: The Gift of Purpose
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Kindness Diaries S2 - "The Gift of Purpose"
programme.desc: After breaking down in Montana, Leon stays in a snowy wonderland. In Salt Lake City one woman’s passion to help others inspires his next gift.

programme.title: Special
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 The Travel Bug S2 - "Special"
programme.desc: We’ve saved the best for last in the final episode of season one of The Travel Bug. Here we take a look at the highlights of the season. We show some amazing places including Lord Howe Island and hidden gems of the Pacific.

programme.title: The Reveal
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 The Flying Kestrel S2 - "The Reveal"
programme.desc: At Santa Pod raceway, engineer and driver Jon Webster reveals the final Flying Kestrel to Joel and Nigel McNully, he gives them a tour around the finished car and shows them all the changes he has made, all to hopefully get a land speed record.

programme.title: New Zealand and Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Travel Quest S1 - "New Zealand and Australia"
programme.desc: Bill has always been fascinated with the Americas Cup yacht racing – it’s as intense as the name implies. But the big adventure is riding in, and then flying, a Soviet Mig Jet doing stunts and mind numbing close fly-bys.

programme.title: Kenyas Great Grasslands
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Travel Quest S1 - "Kenyas Great Grasslands"
programme.desc: Bicycling is a safe and leisurely activity, until you decide to do it through the wilderness of Kenya with large lion, elephant and buffalo populations.

programme.title: Wild Indonesia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Travel Quest S1 - "Wild Indonesia"
programme.desc: Bill had two wild icons he wanted to experience. The first is the largest lizard in the world - the Komodo Dragon. Walking among these massive beasts was unnerving to say the least. The other is Asias one ape - the orangutan.

programme.title: Siberia and Mongolia
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Travel Quest S2 - "Siberia and Mongolia"
programme.desc: This episode literally takes you to some of the world’s remotest places. First, a visit to Siberia…one of the most foreboding places on earth and yet we learn many of the stories are just myths.

programme.title: Ryozenji Temple Shikoku, Japan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Ryozenji Temple Shikoku, Japan"
programme.desc: In this episode the brothers shun the more famous areas, Tokyo and Kyoto, and head to the isolated, ancient island of Shikoku. Their route is the ancient 88 Temple Zen pilgrimage circuit.

programme.title: Kettle Barbecues
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Cooks on Fire S2 - "Kettle Barbecues"
programme.desc: The five returning teams go back to basics cooking poultry on classic kettle barbecues. Just when they think they have it all under control the judges throw them a surprise twist.

programme.title: Palau and Guam
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Travel Quest S2 - "Palau and Guam"
programme.desc: Exploring the islands of Palau and Guam includes a submarine view of the ocean wildlife, exploration of the battles of World War II, learning the culture of the locals and snorkeling among thousands of jellyfish.

programme.title: Panama
programme.desc: There is probably no country in the world that has more to do with world commerce than Panama. But Panama is more than just the canal—it’s a haven for wildlife.

programme.title: Recovery
programme.desc: After a skiing accident, Mike has a swollen face. He heads for Silfra fissure in Thingavellir National Park, to ice his body in the freezing waters.

programme.title: Battling the Elements
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Extreme Iceland S1 - "Battling the Elements"
programme.desc: Mike Wilson heads to the south west highlands, where he gets a tip off that Tindfjallajokull contains all the right elements needed for base jumping.

programme.title: Rivers and Volcanoes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Extreme Iceland S1 - "Rivers and Volcanoes"
programme.desc: Having taken on the roads, snowy slopes and mountains of Iceland, Mike Wilson shifts his attention to other aspects of the landscape: the rivers and volcanoes.

programme.title: Now or Never
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Now or Never"
programme.desc: As the fog passes on the peak of Fish Hooks rocky face, the outline of the crew appears exactly where the ram was bedded last. Did they shoot and Chris not hear the shot?

programme.title: Saddles Sores
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Saddles Sores"
programme.desc: Leaving sheep country on a high, the men face a daunting 22-hour trail ride to Tom-Tom, the first moose camp. Two days of riding loom a head before reaching their destination. However, trouble strikes just eight hours into the journey.

programme.title: Church on the Mountain
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Church on the Mountain"
programme.desc: In the Yukon, decisions are pivotal and amplified in its rugged terrain. The brothers close in on a giant grizzly, now within 500 yards, with the decision lying in Chriss hands.

programme.title: Now or Never
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Dropped S1 - "Now or Never"
programme.desc: With lifted spirits, the Keefer brothers set out to spot and stalk a herd of caribou near by, but closing in proves more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Cache Out
programme.desc: With red meat, the Keefer brothers are finally able to replenish their depleted energy, but they arent the only ones looking to survive the winter in the Alaskan wilderness.

programme.title: Bearing Down
programme.desc: The harsh reality of winter sets in, and the Keefer brothers are forced to sleep with one eye open as a grizzly patrols the area around their camp.

programme.title: Through the Night
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S3 - "Through the Night"
programme.desc: The 24 Hours of Spa is a notoriously difficult race. For Andy Soucek, Albert Costa and Lewis Williamson, making it through night presents a tough challenge.

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: Jamie puts his trust in new explosives technology.

programme.title: Kettle Barbecues
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Cooks on Fire S2 - "Kettle Barbecues"
programme.desc: The five returning teams go back to basics cooking poultry on classic kettle barbecues. Just when they think they have it all under control the judges throw them a surprise twist.

programme.title: Palau and Guam
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Travel Quest S2 - "Palau and Guam"
programme.desc: Exploring the islands of Palau and Guam includes a submarine view of the ocean wildlife, exploration of the battles of World War II, learning the culture of the locals and snorkeling among thousands of jellyfish.

programme.title: Panama
programme.desc: There is probably no country in the world that has more to do with world commerce than Panama. But Panama is more than just the canal—it’s a haven for wildlife.

programme.title: Abandoned Village
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Roads End S1 - "Abandoned Village"
programme.desc: Rob and Dave embrace their adventurous sides when they abandon the plan to take the safe route and instead take on what could be their most challenging riding.

programme.title: Fiambala
programme.desc: In this episode, Rob and Dave drive through Fiambala and decide to stop at the town’s most famous site the naturally occurring hot springs baths.

programme.title: Crater
programme.desc: Rob and Dave continue their journey to Salta, but before they go anywhere near the glorious wine capital they make a detour the Cerro Blanco, a large volcano.

programme.title: Ken Henderson Story
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Fight to Survive S1 - "Ken Henderson Story"
programme.desc: Best friends, Ed Cohen and Ken Henderson, set out for two days of Texas gulf fishing. Tragedy strikes and the two men are stranded adrift in hostile waters.

programme.title: C.J. Wickersham Story
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Fight to Survive S1 - "C.J. Wickersham Story"
programme.desc: This week, well hear the harrowing tale of C.J. Wickersham who will fight to survive a shark attack while spear fishing.

programme.title: Jamey Mosch
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Fight to Survive S1 - "Jamey Mosch"
programme.desc: This week on Trip Gone Bad, were following hunter Jamey Mosch into the Florida everglades as his hunting trips turns into a 4 day nightmare.

programme.title: Into The High Lonesome
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Trail S1 - "Into The High Lonesome"
programme.desc: Modern day Mountain Man Laramy Miller sets out on the trail to experience life in the high lonesome.

programme.title: Camp Otis
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Trail S1 - "Camp Otis"
programme.desc: Life at Camp Otis. Laramy finds success fishing and foraging, and spends his time taking care of 7 and doing camp chores.

programme.title: Relocation
programme.desc: Laramy realizes that game is scarce because of the wolves and he decides to put some distance between himself and the pack. Time to break down camp and move to a new location.

programme.title: Day 5
programme.desc: In the Chinese desert, Kevin finds out that desert racing is difficult. While in Bolivia, Jalou wants to prove to her brother that women can be better drivers.

programme.title: Day 6
programme.desc: After exploring Peru, Jalou has to get over her fear when she goes white water kayaking. In Thailand, Kevin is feeling the pressure.

programme.title: The Track T
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Geared Up S1 - "The Track T"
programme.desc: A 1972 Ford Track T Roadster is incomplete and needs Titan Restorarion;s finishing touch with its flathead V8 engine.

programme.title: The T Bird
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Geared Up S1 - "The T Bird"
programme.desc: A 1957 Ford Thunderbird gets the restoration treatment with new paint, interior, and a rebuilt V8 motor.

programme.title: Brazil
programme.desc: The World’s best Brazilian rider opens the doors to his house to show how it all started and brings us to Mexico for the most famous urban race in the world.

programme.title: Argentina
programme.desc: Two talented Canadian brothers and pro MTB riders decide to go on a freeride trip together and choose to explore the remote desert of Argentina.

programme.title: Episode Thirteen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Thirteen"
programme.desc: Nik explores BMWs electrified future. Mike off-roads in the Nissan Titan Pro-4X. Cadillac shines with the new Escalade. Nik highlights Toyota Tundras value. He enjoys the Jeep Wrangler Rubicon 392.

programme.title: Invasive Species
programme.desc: Protecting Montana Waters from Aquatic Invasive Species is a top priority for Montana FWP. But when AIS check stations are set up in Region 1 and 3 its up to the Wardens to educate the public.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Las Vegas"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie arrives in Las Vegas in a million dollar Lamborghini SVJ roadster. Taken under the wing of Patrick, founder of the Junkyard Pirates, Alex is brought into the rat rod world - home to American mavericks and outsiders.

programme.title: Miami
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Miami"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie is given the keys to a five million dollar Pagani Huayra L’Ultimo as she explores the sub-culture of lowriders with the seal of approval from Horacio Pagani himself. Will she be accepted into this tribe?

programme.title: Detroit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Detroit"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie arrives in ‘Motor City’ in the dead of winter but given access to a half million dollar new Ford GT raises her spirits. Her goal is to learn more about muscle cars, born in Detroit, and her journey takes her in different directions.

programme.title: Morgan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Morgan"
programme.desc: Mat’s demanding client Gordon is in search of a Morgan, but will he be able to find the ideal car for the right price?

programme.title: Citroen DS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Citroen DS"
programme.desc: Mat goes in search of a perfect Citroen DS for Leon, a man who has strong connections to the DS, and to France.

programme.title: Mini
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Mini"
programme.desc: Mat Watson travels Europe on the trail of a very special 1960s Mini.

programme.title: Firepower Un-Boxed
programme.sub-title: S07 : E09 Graveyard Carz S7 - "Firepower Un-Boxed"
programme.desc: Allysa rounds up the team and Mark unveils the surprise crate engine for the Operation Firepower Cuda. Then, he reveals the reason this project is top-secret.

programme.title: Mopar or No Car
programme.sub-title: S07 : E10 Graveyard Carz S7 - "Mopar or No Car"
programme.desc: The engine is removed and the Cuda is slated for paint. But before Will can prepare, he receives a package with something magical inside.

programme.title: Firepower Operation
programme.sub-title: S07 : E11 Graveyard Carz S7 - "Firepower Operation"
programme.desc: Its nearing the end of Operation Firepower. The ghouls are working hard to complete the project and tries to fire up the Cuda for the first time.

programme.title: Scotland
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 The Travel Bug S3 - "Scotland"
programme.desc: No trip to Scotland is complete without hearing bagpipes, putting on a kilt and playing golf, and in this episode, Morgan is doing all that and more. He visits Glasgow and Edinburgh, makes his own bottle of scotch and visits the birthplace of golf.

programme.title: Germany Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 The Travel Bug S3 - "Germany Part 1"
programme.desc: Germany, one of Europe’s biggest countries and a nation full of history and culture. In this episode Morgan kicks off his road trip in the capital, Berlin, before heading south to see where Berliners like to spend their holidays.

programme.title: Germany Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 The Travel Bug S3 - "Germany Part 2"
programme.desc: In this episode Morgan continues his journey through Germany. Hitting the road west he makes his way to Wolfsburg, a city built around the Volkswagen factory. From there he’s off to Cologne before following south along the beautiful River Rhine.

programme.title: Ready to race
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 The Flying Kestrel S2 - "Ready to race"
programme.desc: The Flying Kestrel team heads back to the 2 mile long runway at Elvington, where last year Jon Webster crashed the car. He drives it in anger for the first time since that fateful day but have they done enough?

programme.title: The Record
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 The Flying Kestrel S2 - "The Record"
programme.desc: Driver Jon Webster is strapped in and ready to push the Flying Kestrel to its limits.The Kestrel team must overcome multiple problems on the day to stand any chance of topping the time sheets and can Jon keep the kestrel on track and break the record

programme.title: U.S.A. / Cyprus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Epic Exploring S1 - "U.S.A. / Cyprus"
programme.desc: Cody encounters wild animals and thrilling attractions in abandoned Six Flags, New Orleans. Meanwhile, Josh is in Cyprus where the UN peace keeping force allows him to explore the abandoned Nicosia International Airport and the UN bufferzone.

programme.title: Armenia / Greece
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Epic Exploring S1 - "Armenia / Greece"
programme.desc: Together with rooftopper Elaina Hammeken, Josh explores an incredible radio telescope from the Soviet era in Armenia while Cody experiences an astonishing trip through the Greek mining industry of Ptolemaida with his travel companion, Elvis Brauer.

programme.title: U.S.A. / Belgium
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Epic Exploring S1 - "U.S.A. / Belgium"
programme.desc: While Cody explores lost industries in the ‘ugliest’ city in the world with freerunner Abudi Alsagoff, Josh, together with his old neighborhood friend John Yurei, is in the famous American prison Joliet, where prisoners build their own cells.

programme.title: Best of ep. 1 to 5
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Running the World S1 - "Best of ep. 1 to 5"
programme.desc: Parkour athletes Max and Benj Cave look back over their travels so far and discuss the best places for practising parkour.

programme.title: Lisbon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Running the World S1 - "Lisbon"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave undertake a run where they attempt to escape from Lisbon castle without using any conventional exit routes.

programme.title: Delhi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Running the World S1 - "Delhi"
programme.desc: Parkour athletes Max and Benj Cave head to Delhi India to complete a treacherous final run challenge.

programme.title: Meet Island Air
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Meet Island Air"
programme.desc: Veteran bush pilot Bob Stanford risks everything to save hunters struggling to stay alive in a remote area of Kodiak.

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Fight or Flight"
programme.desc: While on a routine sightseeing flight, a massive storm has the pilots fighting to keep control of the craft and keep their passengers safe.

programme.title: Deadmans Survival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Deadmans Survival"
programme.desc: Island Air battles time and elements, to rescue a group trapped in Deadmans Bay.

programme.title: Valley of Snow
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Valley of Snow"
programme.desc: Snow relentlessly pounds the Keefer brothers at Church Camp, reducing visibility to an all-time low. Theyre snowed in with timetable to resume the hunt, as many problems start to surface.

programme.title: Head to Head
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Dropped S1 - "Head to Head"
programme.desc: With the arctic storm nipping at their heals, the Keefer brothers race down the river to reach their next supply-yielding cache only to become lost as the river divides into a maze of small channels.

programme.title: Edge of the Storm
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Dropped S1 - "Edge of the Storm"
programme.desc: As the temperature plummets, the Keefer brothers fight their way down stream through freezing water and strong headwinds as they hope to reach their extraction site before the arctic storm lays claim to it.

programme.title: Episode 7
programme.desc: A young snowmobilers first ride into the backcountry spins out of control.

programme.title: Episode 8
programme.desc: Tim demands a lot of everyone around him, especially during a cave rescue - what he describes as "the worst kind of rescue possible".

programme.title: Gran Canaria - Part One
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Hunting Fish S1 - "Gran Canaria - Part One"
programme.desc: Thom hunt challenges himself to locate a rare Mirror Carp in stunning Gran Canaria.

programme.title: Cape Verde
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Cape Verde"
programme.desc: An expat fisherman scores a big catch in Cape Verde, while another struggles in Spain. A French BandB receives its first review, and a boutique hotel launches a wedding business.

programme.title: Dream Homes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 House Hunt S1 - "Dream Homes"
programme.desc: Lovebirds Jess and Simon need help from their parents to buy a home on Auckland’s North Shore and Queenstown couple Will and Grace prepare to go to auction on their dream home.

programme.title: Newlyweds
programme.desc: Newly wed immigrants Sam and Maria get some inside info from a real estate agent as they search for a home for their future family.. and in Auckland, North Shore duo Jess and Simon prepare to go to auction on their dream home, but will their budget of $615,000 be enough?

programme.title: Las Vegas, USA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Las Vegas, USA"
programme.desc: Brazilian Bboy Neguin is visiting his friend Bboy Ronnie in his hometown Las Vegas. Ronnie istaking Neguin to meet all the different artists and dancers who are able to make a living inVegas by doing what they love most: performing on stage.

programme.title: Tokyo, Japan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Tokyo, Japan"
programme.desc: Vegas Bboy Ronnie is traveling to Japan to visit Bboy Shigekix in his hometown Tokyo. Shigekix will take Ronnie on an exciting Journey to show the Japanese culture and its unique style of breaking and hip-hop.

programme.title: India: Can Kolkata be considered a foodie destination of India?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Maximum Foodie S1 - "India: Can Kolkata be considered a foodie destination of India?"
programme.desc: Liesel pinballs around a city known for its gastronomy, the forgotten hub of British East India trading company, Kolkata. From trying out what the bustling city’s vibrant street food scene has to offer, to the lesser known gems, including, venturing into India’s only Chinatown and sampling their delicacies. A tale of walking food tours, hole in the wall joints serving up North Eastern dumplings, messy fish markets, and of course, the pride of Bengal, the Hilsa fish. Is Kolkata up to par with the other major metropolitan cities of India? This episode finds out exactly that!

programme.title: Nevada: What else is there in Nevada for foodies besides Vegas?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Nevada: What else is there in Nevada for foodies besides Vegas?"
programme.desc: This investigative mission starts off in the sin city atmosphere of the Vegas strip. After a gluttonous stint at a generic buffet, Liesel is inspired to do a road trip to find iconic gems in the state of Nevada. From ghost towns, to monstrous foodie challenges, to hole in the wall dive bars in the middle of nowhere, this trip has it all. Liesel finds the resurgence of Basque cuisine in Northern Nevada, and learns that Reno can do fine dining as well! A trip to Virginia city also reveals that the Silver State has some haunted bars where patrons from the 1800s are rumored to be still imbibing and spooking locals! It’s a road trip in every sense of the word!

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Aerial Mountains: South Korea S1 - "Episode 2"
programme.desc: Gracefully formed by the earth’s tectonic forces and massive volcanic eruptions, the mountains are a fascinating natural phenomenon, and this aerial journey will seek to discover the spectacular mountains of South Korea.

programme.title: Dannevirke / Norsewood
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Dannevirke / Norsewood"
programme.desc: Piri is in Manawatu in search of kina and paua. He goes rabbit shooting with the local “Ruahine Hunter” in Norsewood.

programme.title: Hokianga
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Hokianga"
programme.desc: Piri goes fishing for Snapper in Mitimiti, and has a go at drag-netting flounder in Whirinaki.

programme.title: Gisborne
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Gisborne"
programme.desc: Piri dives for Kina in Gisborne, and faces his fear of stingrays. Plus, he goes on a voyage on waka Tairawhiti, then visits Te Poho o Rawiri Marae.

programme.title: Manawatu / Whanganui
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Manawatu / Whanganui"
programme.desc: Piri goes in search of the illusive Samba deer near Marton. Plus a journey up the Whanganui River sees him chasing wild pigs.

programme.title: The Berg River
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Berg River"
programme.desc: While Xander gets an up-close look at the tranquil and isolated Kersefontein Farm, Adam becomes a true armchair adventurer, wishing he was experiencing anything besides snowy Canadian weather.

programme.title: The Majestic Cederberg
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Majestic Cederberg"
programme.desc: When Adam’s power goes out in Winnipeg, he decides to spend the day building a snow fort. Meanwhile, Xander and his crew take a trip through Cederberg.

programme.title: From Elands to Lamberts Bay
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "From Elands to Lamberts Bay"
programme.desc: Up next, Xander and his team stop to surf the legendary left break at Elands Bay. After experiencing the peace and tranquility of the ocean with South African locals, Xander and his team hit a snag in their journey.

programme.title: Volcan Madera, Nicaragua
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Volcan Madera, Nicaragua"
programme.desc: The brothers attain their goal of riding motorcycles to the heart of Nicaragua, through the jungle to the isolated beaches of the Pacific coast and back inland: through Spanish-colonial towns, local villages and the huge volcanic island of Ometepe.

programme.title: Yorkshire Dales, England
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Yorkshire Dales, England"
programme.desc: Imagine a 26-pub, 7-day, 60-mile pub-crawl! Doing a traditional ‘ramble’ through the stunning Yorkshire Dales region of northern England, the brother’s stride through the moors and dales and peaks and valleys - legs and livers intact.

programme.title: Erg Chigagga, Sahara, Morocco
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Erg Chigagga, Sahara, Morocco"
programme.desc: From Marrakesh, the brothers take a series of local Berber taxis over the High Atlas Mountains and down into the Draa Valley until the road ends at the edge of the great sand sea of the Sahara where they bury some treasure.

programme.title: Tokyo
programme.desc: Local Exploring in Tokyo is like nothing else. Josh and Lexi Limitless visit the crowded streets, a screaming Monster Cafe and an abandoned ‘Love Hotel’.

programme.title: Nikko
programme.desc: Epic Exploring: Going Local is back in Japan in Nikko as Cody, reunited with Sherman Mak, explores a derelict onsen and an amusement park called Western Village.

programme.title: Goat
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Travel with a Goat S1 - "Goat"
programme.desc: Two foodies travel through Kenya with an animal. Will they decide to have the animal slaughtered after spending three days together with it?

programme.title: Alpaca
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Travel with a Goat S1 - "Alpaca"
programme.desc: Two foodies travel through Peru with an animal. Will they decide to have the animal slaughtered after spending three days together with it?

programme.title: Sheep
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Travel with a Goat S1 - "Sheep"
programme.desc: Two foodies travel through Bulgaria with an animal. Will they decide to have the animal slaughtered after spending three days together with it?

programme.title: Day 2
programme.desc: Jalou has 24 hours to get from Barcelona to Tarragona where she conquers the Catalonian mountains with her mountain bike. Kevin tries to beat her in Slovenia.

programme.title: Day 3
programme.desc: Kevin leaves civilization behind in Suriname, while thousands of kilometers away, Jalou has to go literally through the trees in an Australian forest.

programme.title: Cape Runaway
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Cape Runaway"
programme.desc: Piri visits Opotiki to check out the infamous Horse Sports. Then Piri goes fishing off the rocks for at Cape Runaway with local, Rawiri Waititi.

programme.title: Bluff
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Bluff"
programme.desc: Piri visits Bluff. Diving for paua, fishing for Blue Cod and lunch with the Mayor of Invercargill, Tim Shadbolt.

programme.title: Hicks Bay / Te Araroa
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Hicks Bay / Te Araroa"
programme.desc: Piri heads to Hicks Bay to try and catch kahawai surfcasting. Then Piri meets experienced angler and kuia in Lottin Point to fish for Blue Mau Mau.

programme.title: Wellington
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Wellington"
programme.desc: Piri is joined by the Kina Crew. Spearo styles for Butterfish, hunting for deer on the South Coast and then long lining for Hapuka in the Cook Strait.

programme.title: Fiambala
programme.desc: In this episode, Rob and Dave drive through Fiambala and decide to stop at the town’s most famous site the naturally occurring hot springs baths.

programme.title: Crater
programme.desc: Rob and Dave continue their journey to Salta, but before they go anywhere near the glorious wine capital they make a detour the Cerro Blanco, a large volcano.

programme.title: Stunning Scenario
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Roads End S1 - "Stunning Scenario"
programme.desc: A day of gruelling grape picking lies ahead and the duo discover a new love for the country’s greatest export.

programme.title: Wild Paternoster
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Wild Paternoster"
programme.desc: Adam and Xander go on fishing trips on opposite sides of the globe; one in a winter wonderland and the other in Paternoster, an old South African fishing village.

programme.title: Kraalbaai Caribbean
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Kraalbaai Caribbean"
programme.desc: While Xander and his team experience the joys of wakeboarding in the beautiful Kraalbaai Caribbean, Adam attempts to replicate this experience.

programme.title: Cape Runaway
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Cape Runaway"
programme.desc: Piri visits Opotiki to check out the infamous Horse Sports. Then Piri goes fishing off the rocks for at Cape Runaway with local, Rawiri Waititi.

programme.title: Bluff
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Bluff"
programme.desc: Piri visits Bluff. Diving for paua, fishing for Blue Cod and lunch with the Mayor of Invercargill, Tim Shadbolt.

programme.title: Hicks Bay / Te Araroa
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Hicks Bay / Te Araroa"
programme.desc: Piri heads to Hicks Bay to try and catch kahawai surfcasting. Then Piri meets experienced angler and kuia in Lottin Point to fish for Blue Mau Mau.

programme.title: Wellington
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Wellington"
programme.desc: Piri is joined by the Kina Crew. Spearo styles for Butterfish, hunting for deer on the South Coast and then long lining for Hapuka in the Cook Strait.

programme.title: LA County
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 A Simple Path S3 - "LA County"
programme.desc: Yann explores LA County skateboard communities, visiting Gunters handmade leather goods workshop, Open Gallery, Justins recycled skateboard wood shop, Tito from Local Hearts Foundation, and Eunice a vlogger, emphasizing community and creativity.

programme.title: Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 A Simple Path S3 - "Los Angeles"
programme.desc: Yann explores Los Angeles, visiting Kingswell Skate Shop, meeting DJ Chavez and Norman Woods. He encounters DiOrr Greenwoods artistic skateboards, Hali Stradas fashion and Chandler Burtons unique project merging drag, puppets and skating.

programme.title: New York
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Streets S1 - "New York"
programme.desc: Rapper Shiniqua, aka Pretty Little Monster, juggles motherhood while trying to avoid the trappings of Instagram fame. Her passion is writing rap lyrics and always tries to keep it real.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Streets S1 - "Las Vegas"
programme.desc: Las Vegas is home to a hot rod car club community which over the decades has been connected to the rise of rockabilly music. Through Luke Metz and his band, Shanda and The Howlers, we learn how this bond between fashion, music and cars was created.

programme.title: Europe
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx looks back at her journey to the music dance capitals of Europe to inspire her final track.

programme.title: End of the Season
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "End of the Season"
programme.desc: The best of the big wave surfing community wrap up an amazing El Nino season with the XXL Big Wave Awards in Anaheim, California.

programme.title: Miami
programme.desc: James Lance gets to grips with his Colombian roots while trying to build a career as a Latin hip hop artist. After raising himself as a teenager, he refuses to give up and dreams of a better future.

programme.title: Deep Sea Fishing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Deep Sea Fishing"
programme.desc: Imhambane is a prime fishing destination that will see the girls take to the reefs with local fishermen. Their task here is to fish for all the ingredients that will be required for a Portuguese inspired meal in the evening.

programme.title: Season Finale
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Season Finale"
programme.desc: In celebration of the trip Andi and Chelsey, the girls invite the audience on a behind the scenes tour of the moments that made up their maritime adventure.

programme.title: California Desert
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 My Van Life S1 - "California Desert"
programme.desc: Lisa connects with a nomad poet, who literally helps her ‘climb’ out of her funk by scaling a challenging peak. After taking tea with a magician, Lisa meets a paramedic single mother hoping to imbue her daughter with valuable life experiences.

programme.title: California Coast
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 My Van Life S1 - "California Coast"
programme.desc: After driving across the country, Lisa heads to Santa Monica to hang with a Hollywood producer and check out his pimped out Mercedes Benz G-Wagon. Lisa is welcomed into the school bus home of a family of 7! Because there is always room for one more.

programme.title: Athens
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Athens"
programme.desc: Two American street artists try to turn a school into a piece of art. Seems impossible, but this duo turns out to be a real American Dream Team.

programme.title: Bangalore
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Bangalore"
programme.desc: Two worlds collide in one of the busiest cities in the world when Mexico’s most famous street artist is meeting his equivalent on their home turf in India.

programme.title: Rotterdam
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Rotterdam"
programme.desc: Two European street artists are teaming up in the Netherlands for the ultimate Street Art Challenge but Mother Nature seems to be doing everything to ruin it.

programme.title: Big Wave World Tour
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Big Wave World Tour"
programme.desc: Trevor Carlson puts everything on the line to chase monster waves from Maui, Hawaii to Ensenada, Mexico.

programme.title: Skimboarding Jaws
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Skimboarding Jaws"
programme.desc: Brad Domke aims for the big wave surfing history books by skimming the big waves of Pe’ahi.

programme.title: Pe’ahi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Pe’ahi"
programme.desc: Will Skudin and Keali’i Mamala deal with the trials and tribulations of life as traveling big wave surfers.

programme.title: Rotterdam, The Netherlands
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Rotterdam, The Netherlands"
programme.desc: In the city of Rotterdam, three times world champion, Menno, hosts b-boy Junior from France. Both are considered legends. Menno takes Junior on a trip he will never forget and meet people who have all left their mark in the Dutch breaking community.

programme.title: NYC, USA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Breaking Beyond S1 - "NYC, USA"
programme.desc: Four BC One World Final legends from our series, Ronnie, Neguin, Junior and Shigekix, are coming to NYC. These legends will meet some of the future legends taking part in this year’s world final and take them on a journey through hip hop history.

programme.title: Martin Bochatay and Arthur Maneint
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Capturing Winter S1 - "Martin Bochatay and Arthur Maneint"
programme.desc: Martin and Arthur are two of the world’s best FPV drone pilots. Now the duo team up with pro skier and Olympic medalist, Kevin Rolland, for a unique project ; mount a cinema camera on a racing drone and attempt to film some never-before-seen action.

programme.title: Guido Perrini and Geraldine Fasnacht
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Capturing Winter S1 - "Guido Perrini and Geraldine Fasnacht"
programme.desc: Cinematographer Guido Perrini has created many of the most revered ski and snowboard films. We follow him and multi-talented athlete Geraldine Fasnacht on a snowboarding and base jumping adventure in some of the most stunning peaks in the Swiss Alps.

programme.title: Layla Kerley and Bruno Compagnet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Capturing Winter S1 - "Layla Kerley and Bruno Compagnet"
programme.desc: Layla Kerley is a self-taught adventure photographer and one of the few females in her field. Together with Bruno Compagnet, co-founder of freeski brand Blackcrows, they plan to traverse one of the last wildernesses in Europe: the Italian Dolomites.

programme.title: North Carolina
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Van Life S1 - "North Carolina"
programme.desc: Meet Lisa, a former lawyer who escaped the rat race and moved into a campervan after the early death of her mother. Lisa embarks on a cross-country road trip, peeking inside homes on wheels, and connecting with the incredible community of nomads.

programme.title: Mississippi, Alabama and Arkansas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 My Van Life S1 - "Mississippi, Alabama and Arkansas"
programme.desc: A hurricane in the south forces Lisa to change direction. We meet southern Van Lifers living under the radar in a state where the lifestyle is judged harshly. Tragically, Lisa’s story takes a heavy turn when she discovers that her father has died.

programme.title: Texas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 My Van Life S1 - "Texas"
programme.desc: A colourful graffiti artist in Austin shares her story of loss with Lisa and gives her a tarot reading. We travel to rural Texas to overnight with Jupiter: an outspoken, non-binary person of colour, living in their vintage RV while studying law.

programme.title: Introduction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Introduction"
programme.desc: The journey begins. Andi and Chelsey introduce Mozambique from the luxury of a helicopter. In this episode the girls introduce two key conservationists who will re-join them later for epic ocean safaris. Welcome to Mozambique.

programme.title: Culture
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Culture"
programme.desc: Having sailed and docked at Inhambane, the girls set their coordinates in the direction of Porcos Island where they will visit an isolated island tribe.

programme.title: Surfing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Surfing"
programme.desc: Tofu is a hotspot for surfers from around the world. Andi and Chelsey join up with pro surfer Davey van Zyl and learn to surf in one of Mozambique’s best breaks. In this episode the girls discover the importance of local surfing culture.

programme.title: Mavericks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Mavericks"
programme.desc: Big wave surfing’s elite break routines and converge to ride an unforgettable swell at Mavericks.

programme.title: The Eddie
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "The Eddie"
programme.desc: The world’s elite big wave surfers revel in the biggest most powerful Waimea Bay surf conditions to ever grace the Eddie Aikau Contest.

programme.title: Maui
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Maui"
programme.desc: Tyler Larronde beats the odds to execute a seamless barrel at the legendary big wave known as Mavericks.

programme.title: Copenhagen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Running the World S1 - "Copenhagen"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to Copenhagen to meet up with a local free runner and undertake an epic run of Tivoli Gardens.

programme.title: London
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Running the World S1 - "London"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to London where they are challenged to create a run in the Olympic Park.

programme.title: Chocolate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Chocolate"
programme.desc: Indulge in Laurens exploration of the chocolate world as she uncovers its unique types and characteristics. From savory chocolate salsa to raw vegan cake, her mix of sweet and savory recipes leaves a lasting appreciation for this beloved ingredient.

programme.title: Rome: What are the tourists missing out on?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Rome: What are the tourists missing out on?"
programme.desc: Italy is a vacationer’s paradise. The food, the people, the sights and sounds, the history! But are the tourists doing it right when it comes to the trying out authentic food in Rome? Liesel embarks on a mission to explore the street food of the city. With the help of her food journalist buddy, Saverio de Luca, Liesel sifts through pasticceri, food festivals, touristed hotspots, all in an effort to understand real Roman food.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian poika Justin osoittaa, etta han osaa loytaa jadea, kun taas Scrappy Larry, Robin ja Josh kamppailevat hinaamaan rikkinaisen autonsa Wolverinelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Huonot tulokset pakottavat Robinin ja Justinin viimeiseen yritykseen etsia jadekivia pelastaakseen kauden, kun taas Scrappy Larry kiirehtii muuntamaan dieselilla toimivan sailion.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian hanke majoittaa tyoryhma Jade Cityyn vaarantuu, kun saostussailio vuotaa juomaveteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kylman saan saapuessa aikaisin ja velkojen kasaantuessa miehisto tyontaa, vetaa ja raahaa mammuttimaisen ja mahdollisesti kauden pelastavan lohkareen leirille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun vuoden lupaavinta lohkaretta tyostetaan Wolverinella, Josh ja R2 kolaroivat rekka-autonsa, ja Claudia tiimineen jaavat ymmalleen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kilpailu on kaynnissa, jotta Wolverinen leirista paastaan pois ennen kuin kaikki jaa lumen alle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia joutuu ajamaan kiviautoa, kun hanen miehistonsa kamppailee kivista polkua ylos Wolverinen vuorenhuipulla sijaitsevaan leiriin.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada ihmisia ja varusteita syrjaiseen leiriinsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia ja Robin yrittavat tehda vaikutuksen uusiin liikekumppaneihinsa, mutta ensimmaiset paivat uudella alueellaan Bullion Creekissa ovat turhauttavia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivoksesta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivokselta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Elokuun hurjan lumimyrskyn takia Claudian ja Robinin on pakko jaada 2 Mileen, kun taas Gary ja Garon yrittavat pelastaa tilanteen ajamalla myrskyn lapi ja tuomalla heille tarvikkeita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin tekee vaikean paatoksen rakkaan kaivosautonsa Six packin suhteen toisen kalliiksi tulleen rikkoutumisen jalkeen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Talven lahestyessa Claudia ajaa uupuneen miehistonsa murtumispisteeseen, mika saa kiihkon leimahtamaan ja pakottaa Claudian viimein hyvaksymaan tappionsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Uusi kaivoskausi on taynna ikavia yllatyksia, mutta epatodennakoinen tapahtuma pelastaa tilanteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh on kyllastynyt tyoskentelemaan isalleen, joten han perustaa oman kuorma-autoyrityksensa uudella rekalla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Armeijan kuorma-auto hajoaa julmalla tiella kaivokselle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Gary ja poikansa pelastavat vanhan armeijan kuorma-auton, mutta sen ajaminen kaivokselle on raakaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Garon ja Josh menettavat Six packin hallinnan mutaisilla teilla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Justin lentaa paikalle uuden vaijerisahan kanssa, mutta menettaa malttinsa yrittaessaan asentaa sita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto kohtaa loputtomasti ongelmia yrittaessaan leikata palan 18 metrin pituisesta linssista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia tuo paikalle ison porauskaluston, ja hanella on vain nelja paivaa aikaa loytaa paras jadepaikka, mutta han ja Robin eivat osaa paattaa, mista etsia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehet ottavat yhteen, kun he loppukauden kiireet pakottavat heidat tyoskentelemaan kahdessa kaivoksessa yhta aikaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto irrottaa jadelohkareita J-linssista, mutta iso ongelma tiella uhkaa kaikkea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Claudia ja Robini etsivat jadea poraamalla tuloksetta, edes yhtion geologit eivat paase yksimielisyyteen suunnitelmasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada raskaan kaluston vuorelle ennen kuin tulvivat joet katkaisevat paasyn kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Ilmassa on jannitetta, kun miehisto yrittaa saada raskasta kalustoa mutaiselle, lohkareiden peittamalle 120 kilometrin pituiselle polulle perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksen vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa saada koneensa kulkemaan vyoryvien jokien yli perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksensa vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan on vakuuttunut siita, etta Dynastyn alueella veden tayttaman kuopan alla on jadea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin yrittaa uhmata fysiikan lakeja saadakseen massiivisen uuden kasarmin Wolverinen alueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn porukkaa koettelee huono onni, ja jokainen keksii ainutlaatuisia ratkaisuja huonon onnen karkottamiseksi.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaikki innostuvat, kun he vihdoin alkavat kaivaa esiin lupaavia vihreita lohkareita, joiden miehisto uskoo olevan miljoonien arvoisia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun ulkomaiset sijoittajat piipahtavat yllattaen tarkistamaan Wolverinen kaivosalueen toita, ja Alan yrittaa rauhoittaa tilannetta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Wolverinen kaivoksella vihdoin loydetaan lupaavia lohkareita, miehisto huomaa, etta he ovat saattaneet menna tonttinsa rajojen ulkopuolelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitys kasvaa, kun kaivoskauden loppu lahestyy, ja Jade Cityn miehisto haluaa loytaa kallisarvoisen lohkareen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn kaivostyolaiset yrittavat loytaa rikkauksia - tarpeeksi suuren jadelohkareen, joka tekee vaikutuksen sijoittajiin - ennen kauden paattymista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian ja Robinin testaamattomat koneet alkavat hajota raaalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa ylittaa tulvivia jokia matkalla kaivokselle koneet mukanaan, mutta Josh jaa jalkeen ongelmallisen kaivinkoneen takia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh jaa jumiin pitkalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivokselle, kun pultit irtoavat kaivinkoneesta eika han voi kutsua apua.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaivoskausi alkaa, ja vaikka jadea ei nay, rekkaonnettomuus tuo Jade Citylle onnea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Guysta tulee Wolverinen johtaja, ja uuden tyontekijan palkkaaminen uhkaa suistaa hanen tehtavansa loytaa kauden ensimmainen jadelohkare.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Juuri kun Wolverinen miehisto tehostaa turvallisuusmenetelmiaan, uusi tyontekija Jay romahtaa, mika paljastaa heidan hatavalmiutensa sarot.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh kayttaa uutta kaivinkonetta, kun taas arvottomien kivien kasa saa Claudian harkitsemaan uutta strategiaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan tuo Jade Cityyn ostajaryhman, mika saa Claudian tiimin paniikkiin ja etsimaan kauden ensimmaiset myytavat jadelohkareet.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
