programme.desc: An intoxicated inmate escapes his restraints. A young woman denies she abused her mother, and a guard removes an inmate who is causing a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers struggle with an angry man after he kicks out a patrol car window. A relationship ends when a woman takes a bite out of her boyfriend. An upset wife stabs her husband and he ends up in handcuffs. A woman is happy to celebrate her birthday by going to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman is placed in a restraint chair. A troubled woman with a drug addiction is brought in on prostitution charges. One man is taken to a sobering cell to sleep off his intoxication.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: One man booked for intoxication is placed in a sobering cell for being uncooperative. An aggrieved woman claims Animal Control took her “baby.” A man tells officers he is a “child of God” and actor.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a disorderly man in the detention center is sent to the padded room. A Sarasota, FL man hurls insults at officers while in custody. In Portland, OR a drunk and destructive young man is placed in the drunk-tank. In Las Vegas, NV a woman tries to lie about the reasons behind her detention.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man believes he is an alien wrongfully arrested for obstruction. Claiming to be a law school student, a man just doesn’t understand why he was arrested for trespassing. A woman claims she swallowed her friend’s pills for good reason. A family reunion ends with a bruised and bloodied husband.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two agitated inmates are put in restraints to cool down. A suspected burglar expresses concern over a milk allergy, and an inmate becomes upset about the care given to her belongings.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Angry over her arrest, a woman becomes combative with officers. Busted once again for drugs, a smart young woman knows she is making dumb choices but can’t stop using. A man eluding the police swipes food from his workplace before landing in jail. Officers get a laugh from an arrested panhandler who wants to buy a permit for panhandling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies corral a suspect into a cell after serious turmoil. A man becomes suicidal after being brought in on burglary charges. Facing the gavel, a prisoner berates a Judge during court proceedings.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers transfer an over caffeinated suspect to isolation so he can unwind. A man arrested for DUI while doing donuts in a mall parking lot asserts he was robbed. A jaywalking Utah man claims someone hit him on the head. A disgruntled detainee lands a sucker punch on a fellow inmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Toting his guitar, an inmate serenades the officers. One man protests his arrest and states that having cocaine is not a crime. A man claims to be an Iraqi War Veteran and challenges his detainment.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A singer in custody performs for the officers. A woman is charged with burglary, and officers see right through a young womans tears.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated woman clashes with officers but later shows that good behavior pays off. An experienced prostitute gives solid advice to a younger woman and begs her to get out of the “game.” An angry woman smashes her cheating boyfriend’s windshield.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV a woman becomes violent with officers after having over indulged in boxed wine. In Salt Lake City, UT a drunk man is brought in for urinating in front of a family restaurant and in attempt to expedite his release he requests that the officers "git er done". In Reno, NV a former marine is taken in to custody for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Throw in the Towel
programme.desc: A man arrested for domestic violence threatens to put all the officers in jail. Inmates on kitchen duty get into a fist fight over a dish towel. A woman unsure about her sexual identity is arrested for trespassing at a friend’s home. Officers find an unusual bit of clothing when a man is changed into a jail uniform.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cologne salesman boasts and promotes his "magic potion". A man bloodies his neighbor in a one-sided feud. Taking an illegal drug has an unexpected consequence to one man’s face. Open Booking becomes a stage as one woman launches her singing career.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After totaling his Corvette, a man is arrested for drunk driving. Complex personality issues are unveiled while an inmate is interrogated. A man is placed in a mask after spraying saliva far and wide.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An angry inmate refuses to change clothes. A man in violation of his parole is stopped by officers for attempting to hitchhike. Two men claim they were beaten by their girlfriends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an intoxicated man is strapped to a restraining chair. In Portland, OR a seemingly gracious man is arrested for assault. In Spokane, WA a homeless man is brought in for assault. In Salt Lake City, UT a frequent visitor is brought in for threating the security staff at a local bar with a firearm.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A media circus surrounds OJ Simpson as he is placed in jail for violating his bail agreement. During a body search, a man is tased and pepper-sprayed. A parole violation calls for all hands-on deck.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A fight involving female detainees breaks out after one woman accuses the other of staring at her. A man is arrested for shattering the hotel glass door as a result of a fight. An old crooner believes that rap stars are going to bail him out of jail. Handcuffs don’t stop a woman from trying to flirt with an officer.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested on drug warrants is upset about the BBQ brisket he left on the grill. An intoxicated ladies man flirts with the jail staff and an inmate finds it funny that he sold tree leaves as pot to an undercover officer. Brother turns on brother when a good deed gets mixed with alcohol. A man caught panhandling believes officers should arrest hardened criminals instead of him.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two sisters go on a mini-crime spree, get caught and find no one will bail them out. A domestic argument about night fishing lands a husband in jail for breaking into his own car. An irate inmate blows off steam by doing laps in her jail cell. A woman finds out it’s hard to stop selling drugs when the neighborhood knows her business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Throw in the Towel
programme.desc: A man arrested for domestic violence threatens to put all the officers in jail. Inmates on kitchen duty get into a fist fight over a dish towel. A woman unsure about her sexual identity is arrested for trespassing at a friend’s home. Officers find an unusual bit of clothing when a man is changed into a jail uniform.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Angry over her arrest, a woman becomes combative with officers. Busted once again for drugs, a smart young woman knows she is making dumb choices but can’t stop using. A man eluding the police swipes food from his workplace before landing in jail. Officers get a laugh from an arrested panhandler who wants to buy a permit for panhandling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Las Vegas Motor Mouth
programme.desc: A belligerent man with a grudge is placed in a restraint chair. An intoxicated woman receives a love note from an inmate on worker status.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man brought in for trespassing becomes violent. A sex worker admits she۪s witholding her pediculosis condition from clients. A woman explains her tattoos are a reminder of the women she loved.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman tries to conceal illegal substances in her bra. Bandmates are charged for tresspassing, and two inmates are separated and placed in restraints after losing control.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman refuses to wear jail-issued clothing. A man tells his tearful tale to officers, and a chatty inebriated woman is placed in isolation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An agitated man is overly concerned about his 30K watch. cries when he has blood drawn. An inebriated woman threatens her arresting officers with bodily harm, and a woman has no recollection of her arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative inmate complicates things. A man charged with DUI complains about the prison food. A security guard arrested for robbery fears that her dream job with Homeland Security is gone.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Come to Daddy
programme.desc: Kun Norval saa odottamatta kirjeen vieraantuneelta isaltaan, han matkustaa isan syrjaiselle rantatalolle. Mutta hyvin pian han huomaa omituisen tunnelman, ja kaivatusta jalleentapaamisesta muodostuu helvetillinen painajainen.

programme.title: Kuuhullut (Moonstruck)
programme.desc: Tassa klassisessa romanttisessa komediassa Brooklynin leski (Cher) on valmis menemaan uudelleen naimisiin. Talla kertaa han aikoo tehda sen oikein, vaikka joutuisikin sanomaan ”kylla” miehelle, jota han ei oikeasti rakasta. Mutta kun han rakastuu sulhasensa veljeen (Nicolas Cage), seuraa romanttinen mutka, joka on arvoinen suurimpia koomisia oopperoita! Olympia Dukakis on myos mukana.

programme.title: Results
programme.desc: PT-valmentajat (Cobie Smulders ja Guy Pearce) saavat tehtavakseen saada uusrikas ja hyvin motivoitumaton asiakas (Kevin Corrigan) kuntoon. Pian tassa fiksussa ja hauskassa rakkautta ja ruumiinkuntoa kasittelevassa komediassa naiden kolmen elama ammatti- ja yksityiselama sotkeutuu umpisolmuun.

programme.title: Peace, Love and Misunderstanding
programme.desc: Komedia menestyksekkaasta newyorkilaisesta asianajajasta (Catherine Keener), joka tuo mukanaan kaksi vilkasta teini-ikaista lastaan hippiaitinsa (Jane Fonda) luo maalle perhelomalle. Rentouttava viikonloppu muuttuu kuitenkin pian seikkailun, romantiikan, musiikin, perhesalaisuuk sien ja itsensa loytamisen kesaksi.

programme.title: Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach
programme.desc: Yhdysvaltalaisen opinahjon sahlari vahtimestari ryhtyy koulun hairikkonuorten tennisvalmentajaksi. Tavoitteena on voittaa Nebraskan osavaltion tennismestaruus.

programme.title: Hamekytta - Pojasta Polvi Paranee
programme.desc: Todistettuaan murhan FBI-agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) ja hanen poikapuolensa (Brandon T. Jackson) joutuvat vetamaan valeasut niskaansa ja ryhtymaan tutkimuksiin – ainoastaan tytoille tarkoitetussa taidekoulussa. Entistakin enemman hauskuutta!

programme.title: Trinity ratsastaa jalleen
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kierteleva Trinity on palannut! Talla kertaa lannen nopein Trinity ja hanen velipuolensa, rautanyrkkinen Bambino lyottaytyvat yhteen kunnioittaakseen isansa viimeista toivetta. Kuolinvuoteellaan isa oli toivonut pojistaan tulevan kunniallisia, tyonsa vakavasti ottavia lainsuojattomia, joiden paista virkavalta voisi kitsastelematta luvata muhkean palkkion. Veljekset kuitenkin huomaavat, etta isan toiveen toteuttaminen on helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Hakeutumalla innokkaasti vaikeuksiin ja tappeluihin kaikkialla minne paatyvatkaan, Trinity ja Bambino toivovat nostavansa summaa etsintakuulutuksissaan...

programme.title: The Stag
programme.desc: Moderni sulhanen suostuu vastentahtoisesti polttariviikonloppuun kaupunkilaisystaviensa kanssa. He lahtevat leireilemaan Lansi-Irlannin villiin luontoon. Porukan kauhuksi matkaan lyottaytyy morsiamen arvaamaton veli, johtajahahmo nimelta ”Kone”. Koneen rajahtava luonne ja hurjat johtamistavat vievat ryhman matkalle, jota he eivat unohda ikina.

programme.title: The King of Comedy
programme.desc: Uransa kanssa kamppaileva koomikko uhkapelaa epavarman tulevaisuutensa tehdessaan hullun suunnitelman saada lunnaiden avulla tiensa televisioon kidnappaamalla suositun keskusteluohjelman isannan.

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: Hellyttava komedia omalaatuisesta keski-ikaisesta kirjailijasta Richard Dunnista (JEFF DANIELS), jonka tyhjan paperin syndrooma on sysannyt syrjaseudulle metsastamaan inspiraatiota. Vaimonsa ja kuvitteellisen supersankarin paheksunnasta huolimatta Richard ystavystyy paikallisen samanmielisen teinityton kanssa. Toisiltaan he saavat vastaukset kysymyksiin, joita he eivat ole osanneet esittaa.

programme.title: MacGruber
programme.desc: Maailmanrauha on vaarassa, terroristit vaanivat, maailma tarvitsee supersankarin, jolla on tukka kuin Hillary Clintonilla. Kenelle pitaa soittaa? MacGruberille! Han on sotakone ilman asetta, mutta kehittaa mita vaan pelkasta klemmarista. Han on niin salainenagentti, etta kukaan ei edes tieda miehen etunimea! Naiset haluavat olla kuin han ja miehet haluavat olla hanen kanssaan... vai miten se meni?

programme.title: Nimeni on Trinity - paholaisen oikea kasi
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kiertava Trinity paatyy polyiseen pikkukaupunkiin, jossa hanta odottaa todellinen yllatys. Hanen lainsuojaton velipuolensa Bambino on kaupungin sheriffi! Tosin Bambino on ottanut pestin vastaan vain, koska on jalleen lakia paossa ja tarvitsee valehenkilollisyytta piiloutuakseen... Kaupungin mahtavimmalla miehella, majuri Harrimanilla on saalimattomia suunnitelmia valtansa ja maa-alueittensa kasvattamiseksi, mutta laheisessa laaksossa asuva mormoniyhdyskunta on suunnitelmien tiella. Harriman miehineen aikoo vaikka vakipakolla ajaa mormonit alueelta... Mutta yhdyskunnan kanssa ystavystynyt Trinity sotkee mielellaan Harrimanin kuviot.

programme.title: Unelmien Naapuri
programme.desc: Teravapiirtokuvalla ja bonusmateriaaleilla varustettu Emile Hirschin, Elisha Cuthbertin ja Timothy Olyphantin tahdittama riehakas komedia on kuumempi kuin koskaan! High Schoolista juuri valmistuva luokan priimus, Matthew Kidman haluaa saada koulun paatokseen ilman teinihorhoilyjen aiheuttamia ongelmia. Valitettavasti, ongelma muuttaa naapuriin, eika Matthew pysty vastustamaan kiusausta.

programme.title: Kostaja haudan takaa
programme.desc: Jimmylla on pakkomielle saada yhteys kuolleeseen aitiinsa mustan magian kautta ja han on pelottavan lahella onnistua. Mutta kun hanen uusi ystavansa Amir yrittaa saada hanet tekemaan vaikutuksen koulun kuumimpiin tyttoihin yksinkertaisella rituaalilla, jatkat vapauttavat pahan voiman, joka voi herattaa kuolleet ja tehda aidista zombien.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach
programme.desc: Yhdysvaltalaisen opinahjon sahlari vahtimestari ryhtyy koulun hairikkonuorten tennisvalmentajaksi. Tavoitteena on voittaa Nebraskan osavaltion tennismestaruus.

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: Hellyttava komedia omalaatuisesta keski-ikaisesta kirjailijasta Richard Dunnista (JEFF DANIELS), jonka tyhjan paperin syndrooma on sysannyt syrjaseudulle metsastamaan inspiraatiota. Vaimonsa ja kuvitteellisen supersankarin paheksunnasta huolimatta Richard ystavystyy paikallisen samanmielisen teinityton kanssa. Toisiltaan he saavat vastaukset kysymyksiin, joita he eivat ole osanneet esittaa.

programme.title: Off the Rails
programme.desc: Kolme viisikymppista naista haluaa toistaa nuoruutensa Interrail-seikkailut Euroopassa sen jalkeen kun heidan laheinen ystavansa kuolee ja jattaa heille junaliput seka viimeisen toivomuksen: heidan pitaa ottaa naisen tytar mukaan. Talla kertaa matkustelu ympari Eurooppaa osoittautuu vaikeaksi heille, kun kadonneet passit, junalakot ja odottamattomat romanttiset suhteet sekoittavat heidan ystavyyssuhteensa. Kysymys kuuluukin: ehtivatko he ajoissa kunnioittamaan ystavansa muistoa?

programme.title: The Happytime Murders
programme.desc: Melissa McCarthyn tahdittama raavittoman hilliton komedia Elokuva sijoittuu Los Angelesin laitamille, jossa nuket ja ihmiset elavat rinta rinnan. Kaksi erimielista etsivaa, toinen ihminen, toinen nukke, joutuvat tyoskentelemaan yhdessa selvittaakseen kuka murhaa julmasti suositun The Happytime Gang -nukkeshow’n entisia tahtia.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Katastrofielokuvassa seurataan joukkoa naurettavan kuvankauniita nuoria, jotka joutuvat yhden illan aikana lahes jokaisen mahdollisen luonnonkatastrofin riepottelemaksi. Asteroidit, pyorremyrskyt ja maanjaristykset saapuvat tuhoamaan kaupunkia ja vaikeuttavat nuorten yritysta keskeyttaa valtoimenaan riehuvaa havitysta. Hyokkayksen kohteeksi joutuvat mm. Indiana Jones, Iron Man, Amy Winehouse, High School Musical ja monet muut suositut elokuvat, pop-ikonit ja julkkikset.

programme.title: To Rome With Love
programme.desc: To Rome With Love on yhteen maailman hurmaavimmista kaupungeista sijoittuva kaleidoskooppinen komedia, jota tahdittavat mm. Alec Baldwin ja Penelope Cruz seka elokuvan ohjaaja Woody Allen. Tutustumme mm. Roomassa lomailevaan,tunnettuun amerikkalaiseen arkkitehtiin, jonka reissu muuttuu aikamatkaksi hanen omaan nuoruuteensa seka keskiluokkaiseen ja perin tavalliseen paikalliseen perheenisaan, josta yhtakkia tuleekin superjulkkis. Ikuisen kaupungin kapeilla kujilla nuoret rakastavaiset Antonio ja Milly joutuvat tahoillaan kummallisten ja romanttisten kohtaamisten kieputukseen.

programme.title: Adult Life Skills
programme.desc: Anna on jumissa. Han on melkein 30, mutta asuu aitinsa puutarhavajassa, ei juttele juuri kenenkaan kanssa ja viettaa aikansa tekemalla lyhytelokuvia, joissa nayttelevat hanen peukalonsa. Jotakin puuttuu, ja eristyneisyys nayttaa olevan Annan tapa kasitella suurta surua. Mutta kun Anna sattumalta ystavystyy kahdeksanvuotiaan cowboyn kanssa, han alkaa pikkuhiljaa avautua. Adult Life Skills on Rachel Tunnardin ensimmainen pitka elokuva, joka kertoo yhta lailla surullisen kuin hauskankin tarinan kuolemasta ja sen kanssa elamisesta. Broadchurch-tahti Jodie Whittaker tulkitsee sulkeutuneen Annaan roolin kauniisti ja humoristisesti.

programme.title: 36 Husbands
programme.desc: 36 Husbands on mystinen, musikaalinen Kung Fu -vakoojakomedia, jonka paaosissa on 3 vahvaa naista - ja joukko aviomiehia. Kristalla, huippuvakoojalla ja Kung Fu -mestarilla, on poikkeuksellisia voimia, ja han ottaa ne kayttoon pyrkiessaan hidastamaan tasaista kulkua kohti kolmatta maailmansotaa.

programme.title: Big Mommas House
programme.desc: Karannutta vankia jahtaava agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) lahtee suorittamaan peitetehtavaa ja pukeutuu maarailevaksi ja isokokoiseksi mummoksi, joka mottaa yhta kovaa kuin komentaakin.

programme.title: Kostaja haudan takaa
programme.desc: Jimmylla on pakkomielle saada yhteys kuolleeseen aitiinsa mustan magian kautta ja han on pelottavan lahella onnistua. Mutta kun hanen uusi ystavansa Amir yrittaa saada hanet tekemaan vaikutuksen koulun kuumimpiin tyttoihin yksinkertaisella rituaalilla, jatkat vapauttavat pahan voiman, joka voi herattaa kuolleet ja tehda aidista zombien.

programme.title: 68 Kill
programme.desc: Palkitun Trent Haagan ohjaama rakkaustarina feminiinisyydesta, maskuliinisuudesta ja 68 000 dollarin varkaudesta. Chip on simppeli kaveri, jolla on upea tyttoystava nimelta Liza. Liza tosin hankkii heidan elantonsa namusedaltaan, mutta toisaalta jokaisessa parisuhteessa on omat erikoisuutensa. Kun Liza ehdottaa, etta he veisivat limaiselta hyvantekijaltaan ison tukun rahaa, Chip nakee naisessa puolen, josta ei ole tiennyt mitaan… tai jonka olemassaoloa ei ole suostunut myontamaan. Nyt Chipilla on ase kasissaan, tytto perakopissaan ja alle 24 tuntia aikaa selvita melkoisesta sotkusta.

programme.title: Fast Food Nation
programme.desc: Don Anderson on Mickey’sin markkinointivastaava, joka kehitti myos firman suurimman menestyspurilaisen, Big Onen. Tutkimukset paljastavat, etta purilaisten sisalto ei vastaa tuoteselostetta, jolloin Don paattaa alkaa tutkia koko tuotantoketjua. Hanen loytonsa ovat lievasti sanoen jarkyttavia. Fast Food Nation on Oscar-ehdokkaan Richard Linklaterin (Boyhood, Rakkautta ennen aamua) ohjaama draamakomedia, jossa vaikuttavat Greg Kinnear (Little Miss Sunshine, Elama on ihanaa) ja Bruce Willis (Die Hard, Moonrise Kingdom).

programme.title: Thanks for Sharing
programme.desc: Paallepain ymparistokonsultti Adamilla, yksityisyrittaja Mikella ja ensiapulaakari Neililla ei ole mitaan yhteista, mutta he kaikki ovat mukana 12 askeleen ohjelmassa kohti vapautta riippuvuuksistaan. Adam ei uskalla heittaytya uuteen rakkauteen, Mike yrittaa raivokkaasti kontrolloida perhettaan eika Danny suostu myontamaan ongelmiaan, mutta haasteet ja pienet askeleet yhdistaa miehet perheeksi, joka kannustaa, raivostuttaa ja kiittaa toisiaan matkalla uuteen elamaan.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: To Rome With Love
programme.desc: To Rome With Love on yhteen maailman hurmaavimmista kaupungeista sijoittuva kaleidoskooppinen komedia, jota tahdittavat mm. Alec Baldwin ja Penelope Cruz seka elokuvan ohjaaja Woody Allen. Tutustumme mm. Roomassa lomailevaan,tunnettuun amerikkalaiseen arkkitehtiin, jonka reissu muuttuu aikamatkaksi hanen omaan nuoruuteensa seka keskiluokkaiseen ja perin tavalliseen paikalliseen perheenisaan, josta yhtakkia tuleekin superjulkkis. Ikuisen kaupungin kapeilla kujilla nuoret rakastavaiset Antonio ja Milly joutuvat tahoillaan kummallisten ja romanttisten kohtaamisten kieputukseen.

programme.title: Hell Town
programme.desc: In Hell Town (aka Born to the West) John Wayne is back in the saddle as two-fisted Dare Rudd, a roaming cowhand trying to prove he can win a womans love and outwit a crooked saloon owner. This exciting B-movie from Paramount Pictures was based on a novel by western writer Zane Grey. With a wild and wooly cast that includes Johnny Mack Brown, Marsha Hunt, Monte Blue, and Lucian Littlefield, director Charles Barton (Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein) gives us a tale of romance, action, and high stakes gambling!

programme.title: Range War
programme.desc: William Boyd returns in the 25th of 66 Hopalong Cassidy adventures. This time Hopalong goes undercover to expose a group of ranchers who are interfering with the building of a new railroad. Also, look for Russell Hayden as Lucky Jenkins, and Britt Wood as Speedy McGinnis. Its a great, action-packed adventure from director Leslie Selander (Flight to Mars, Riders of the Range), and further proof that no one pushes Hoppy around and gets away with it!

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: Randolph Scott plays James Barlow, an agent from Chicago hired to bring the notorious Reno brothers to justice. But wouldnt you know it? The Reno gang includes a beautiful young woman (Mala Powers), who catches Barlows eye. This western from director Tim Whelan (The Thief of Bagdad) features cinematography by two-time Oscar winner Ray Rennahan (Gone With The Wind), while the screenplay was by noted author Horace McCoy (They Shoot Horses, Dont They?). Theres also an all-star cast, including Forrest Tucker, J. Carrol Naish, Edgar Buchanan, Denver Pyle, and several other shaggy sidewinders!

programme.title: Valley of Vengeance
programme.desc: LUST FOR GOLD BROUGHT MASSACRE TO HUNDREDS! Death Rode the Plains! Directed by Sam Newfield and starring Buster Crabbe (Flash Gordon) and Al St. John, Valley of Vengeance opens with Billy Carson (Crabbe) shooting two affluential town officials after they - and a band of outlaws - had murdered his and Fuzzys (St. John) parents years earlier. Arrested for the shootings, Billy tells the story of the outlaws killing his parents and the events that led to his shooting the town officials. Will Billy be able to prove his innocence and bring and end to the corrupted officials?

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: Born to Battle
programme.desc: Cyclone Tom Saunders starts a ruckus in a Chinese laundry and has to go before a judge. Unable to pay his fine, he is bailed out by a local cattle rancher and agrees to do 30 days work for him. Its not too long before he becomes enmeshed in a war between rustlers and outlaws.

programme.title: Call of the Forest
programme.desc: Theres plenty of drama in this tale of lost gold mines, gallant stallions, and fuzzy bears. Starring Ken Curtis, Robert Lowery, and Chief Thundercloud, this charming little film is highlighted by Karl Struss stunning photography

programme.title: Mason of the Mounted
programme.desc: Canadian Mountie Mason is sent south of the border to look for a horse thief with only a watch chain for evidence. He befriends young Andy and when Calhoun hits Andy, Mason and Calhoun fight. In the scuffle Calhouns watch with the missing chain is dislodged. Mason then sets out to bring in Calhoun and his gang.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In Safe Crackers, Pat and Stoney are ordered to break up a safe cracking gang preying on Colorado banks handling government silver bullion. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, the G-Men go to Denver to investigate a silver fraud. Starring Russel Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe is pelted with eggs after his team, the Hooterville Hornets, lose a game. Worse, Bedloe is back in town, which is never a good sign. It turns out Bedloe is planning a suroprise inspection with help frmo the railroad. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate hires Herby to work as an assistant manager at the hotel, causing Uncle Joe to fear for his position. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho are falsely accused of robbing a stagecoach. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Two bandits impersonate Cisco and Pancho, sending the two to prison for robbery and murder. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie make their way to the town of Coffeyville where they run into the Dalton brothers who are seeking to commit a double bank robbery. Also starring Myron healey, Robert Bray and Robert Foulk. Look for future Daniel Boone/Davy Crocket star Fess Parker as a member of the Dalton gang. Episode originally aired in 1954.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark and his partner Frankie head to Tombstone, Arizona to find Doc Holliday with suspicion that Holliday is involved in the gang activity there. Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Kim Spalding, Frank Richards, James Craven amd Harry Harvey. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired in 1954. Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 Spirit of the Law
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West.In this episode, Judge Bean intervenes when two brothers accuse each other of crimes including cattle rustling. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Bill Davis is killed and the Judge and Jeff track the killers to Mexico. They are joined by rancher John Gorman, who is suspiciously eager to instantly hang those responsible. Two mysterious riders complicate things. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Link and Evie Tabor, struggling to work their ranch after a rodeo accident leaves Link in a wheelchair, find themselves vulnerable to outlaws. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which received a Primetime Emmy Award nomination in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: When the Peters family, seemingly angry at the world and desiring nothing but to be left alone, arrives in Diablo, Annie, Tagg and Lofty try to find out what is making the Peters family act so hostile. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook help an old woman find her son who has been missing for 18 years.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook help the long-lost son of a Cree tribal chief.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingacchook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joes date, Jennifer, is abducted and held for ransom at the circus. He and Hoss search the circus for her, facing a tough crowd of carnies in their search.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Home in Oklahoma
programme.desc: The entire gang is here! Roy Rogers, Dale Evans, Gabby Hayes, and Trigger are all involved in a murder mystery involving the death of a wealthy ranch owner. Songs include I Wish I Was A Kid Again and Cowboy Ham and Eggs.

programme.title: Lights of Old Santa Fe
programme.desc: Roy Rogers gets involved when his buddy finds himself at odds with a rival rodeo operator. Theres plenty of singing in this musical western, plus enough action to make you realize that Roy Rogers was much more than a singing cowboy! With a cast that includes Dale Evans, George Gabby Hayes, Lloyd Corrigan, and Tom Keene, director Frank McDonald gives us a fun thrill ride through old Santa Fe. Trigger is here, too!

programme.title: The Yellow Rose of Texas
programme.desc: Fans of Roy Rogers and Dale Evans will relish this western adventure. It features no less than nine musical numbers! Songs include, The Timber Trail, Western Wonderland, Lucky Me, Unlucky You, Song of the Rover, and more. Theres even a tune partly written by Cuban bandleader Xavier Cugat! In between songs, theres a plot about a robbery, with Roy playing an insurance investigator trying to solve the riddle of the missing money.

programme.title: Kentucky Rifle
programme.desc: His Wits, Weapons and Women, Turned Defeat Into Victory! A man brings a wagonload of Kentucky rifles through Indian Territory. Unfortunately the Indians realize what he has and offer the travelers an ultimatum: the rifles or their lives! Starring Lance Fuller, Sterling Holloway, Henry Hull, Chill Wills, Cathy Downs, and Jeanne Cagney, plus one of the great B-Western heels, I. Stanford Jolley!

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Baseball superstar Gehrig is one of several ranchers being coerced by a bunch of bandits. His sister and her lawyer/lover organize the ranchers. Directed by Ray Taylor; starring Smith Ballew, Gehrig, Evelyn Knapp. Talk about stunt casting! Gehrig was a New York Yankees star who was nearing the end of his career, but one of the biggest sports stars in the country. In the movie he plays a variation of himself, as Lou Gehrig, a retired baseball player who takes up ranching. Lou expects to relax on his ranch but quickly joins other ranchers in a fight to protect their properties.

programme.title: Randy Rides Alone
programme.desc: John Wayne was 27 when he starred in this vintage western drama from Hollywoods Poverty Row. He plays Randy Bowers, a man wrongly jailed for murders. With help from a female friend, he breaks out of prison and sets out to find the real killers. Harry L. Fraser (The Last of the Clintons, Rustlers Paradise) directs a strong cast of familiar faces, including legendary sidekick George Gabby Hayes, Earl Dwyer, and one of the hardest ridin stuntmen turned actors, Yakima Canutt.

programme.title: Riders of the Whistling Pines
programme.desc: GENE AUTRY COMES ROARING OUT OF THE SKIES...to save the forests from an outlaw lumber ring! When ex forest ranger Gene tries to interfere with a gang destroying the timberland, hes framed for cattle-poisoning and set up for a murder charge. Yet, he still has time to sing some great cowboy songs, including Its My Lazy Day, and Hair of Gold. This is Gene Autry in a slightly different role, with some great footage filmed at Big Bear Valley and San Bernardino National Forest.

programme.title: The Tall Texan
programme.desc: A group of disparate travelers journey together through the Southwest soon find trouble when they all get gold fever. The action and drama are heightened when they discover gold. The Tall Texan (Lloyd Bridges), is a suspected murderer in the custody of sheriff Lee J. Cobb, and now stranded in Indian territory after a Comanche attack on their stagecoach.

programme.title: Courageous Avenger
programme.desc: Gold, gangs, and the heroic fight for life! Johnny Mack Brown (Billy the Kid, Coquette) stars in this western thriller about murders going on in a mining community. Its a story full of twists, where the greed for gold is only surpassed by the struggle for life!

programme.title: The Gunman from Bodie
programme.desc: The Rough Riders, a popular group that thrilled audiences in the early 1940s, are after a gang of rustlers in this B-western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Starring Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, and Raymond Hatton, this movie features everything from lawmen going undercover to the Rough Riders looking after an orphaned baby! Also, be on the lookout for the beautiful Christine McIntyre, who would go on to appear in several of the Three Stooges shorts for Colombia Pictures.

programme.title: The Red Rope
programme.desc: Hired killers and Old West outlaws stand front and center in this riveting tale from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Bob Steele, one of the busiest stars in movie history (everything from the silent era to Republic Pictures to working with Clint Eastwood in Hang Em High) is here as Tom Shaw, the target of a bad mans desperation and hate. Steele appeared in more than 240 movies and television shows, but was never more impressive than in The Red Rope!

programme.title: The Terror of Tiny Town
programme.desc: Some incredibly small actors were hired to star in this peculiar cult film. Its all about the villainous Bat Haines (Little Billy Rhodes), who is wreaking havoc on Tiny Town. Can Buck Lawson (Billy Curtis) and the townspeople band together and drive him away? This oddity, which was originally distributed by Columbia Pictures, was directed by one of the most prolific low budget filmmakers in Hollywood history, Sam Newfield, a man with over 200 movies to his credit. While it has appeared on many Worst of all time lists, it deserves to be seen at least once!

programme.title: Springtime in the Sierras
programme.desc: Ads for this Roy Rogers classic roared HEAD FOR THE MUSICAL HILLS...ROY IS GUNNIN FOR THRILLS! And thrills are what youll get when you watch this fun, action packed B-Western from Republic Pictures. Theres some great comic relief from Andy Devine and Chester Conklin, two of Hollywoods all-time greats. This old-fashioned shoot-em-up was directed by William Witney, who would go on to direct many of televisions top western sagas, including Bonanza, Wagon Train, and The Wild, Wild West.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. Starring Russell Hayden and Jackie Coogan. This episode, Hangfire, also stars Phil Arnold, Dorothy Patrick, and Herman Hack.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In Hush Money, the G-men are trying to clear a title for a ranch when they discover a murder. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to advertise Shady Rest as a hotel for honeymooners.But is Hooterville really the best place for a honeymoon? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 A Night at the Hooterville Hilton
programme.desc: Upon reading a fantastical brochure Uncle Joe made, a hotel critic comes to Shady Rest. Can Hooterville live up to Joes hype? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho must prove their innocence when they are accused of killing the assistant to the sheriff in Bonanza.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 .This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco tries to help a beautiful woman prove that her brother is innocent after hes arrested for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Following their activity with the Quantrill Raiders, the Younger Brothers return on the scene to commit a bank robbery in Minnesota. Detectives Matt and Frankie work to put a stop to their plan. Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, George Wallace, Gregory Walcott, Louise Beavers, and Sheb Wooley. Directed by William Witney. Epsiode originally aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: The notorious John Wesley Hardin kills two people while on a cattle drive to Abilene. Matt and Frankie head out to bring him to justice. Richard Webb stars as John Wesley Hardin. Also starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Howard Negley, Robert Karnes amd John Eldredge. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired April 9, 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West.In this episode, Miguel, a young Mexican, inherits a silver mine from his father. After the Rio Grande changes course and the mine becomes part of United States territory, two con men stake a claim on it. Judge Bean wants to help Miguel, but the law is on the side of the bad guys. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 The Wedding of Old Sam
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In The Wedding of Old Sam, the judge tries to do a favor for an old friend, but he finds himself involved in a marriage proposal and a somewhat illegal impersonation. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A young bank teller is in trouble after a beautiful woman robs the bank. Annie steps in to try and prove the young bank tellers innocence. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: An ex-convict is trying to work as a rancher, but his outlaw brother wants him to resume his life of crime. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook go undercover as managers of a trading post. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A trader ignites a war between the Hurons and the settlers. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Gunnar, a long-lost relative of the Cartwright family, arrives in Ponderosa, where the family takes him in for the night. Unknown to the Cartwrights, however, is Gunnars leading of The Comancheros, a dangerous band of criminals. After Little Joe and his girlfriend are kidnapped by The Comancheros, the Cartwrights and Gunnar must work things out.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Crashing Thru
programme.desc: Down the danger trail sweeps a crimson fury... as Renfrew rides again! In this action-packed adventure, Sgt. Renfrew must face off against a group of criminals involved in a gold robbery. With his partner, Constable Kelly, wounded in a gunfight, Renfrew must stop the thieves on his own. Directed by Elmer Clifton; starring James Newill and Warren Hull, this is one adventure you wont want to miss!

programme.title: Prairie Pals
programme.desc: ITS A MODERN GOLD RUSH GANGSTER STYLE! But Three Ridin Singin Fightin Buckaroos Stop Em Cold! The Prairie Pals are on the lookout for Wainwright, a scientist who has gone missing after discovering a way to turn vanadium ore into gold. The Prairie Pals start their search at Hank Stoners land, where the vanadium ore can be found. Directed by Sam Newfield; starring Bill Cowboy Rambler Boyd, Art Davis, and Lee Powell.

programme.title: Shine on Harvest Moon
programme.desc: Jackson and his gang are cattle rustlers holed up in Jackson Hole Wyoming. Roys partner Brower was once Jacksons partner and is now suspected of being in cahoots with him. Someone is tipping off Jackson as to the cattles whereabouts and when Roy learns who it is he has a plan to trap Jackson and clear his partner. Starring Roy Rogers, Lynne Roberts, and Myrtle Wiseman as Lulu Belle. Directed by Joseph Kane.

programme.title: Enemy of the Law
programme.desc: Tex Ritter stars in this western drama about a man who goes undercover to befriend a convict believed to have stolen a shipment of government gold. Also starring Guy Wilkerson as Panhandle Perkins, this offering from Hollywoods Poverty Row features the usual fistfights and entertaining storyline that made these modestly budgeted features well worth watching. Songs include Teach Me To Forget and You Will Have to Pay both sung by Tex!

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: During the French and Indian War, Alice and Cora Munro are joined by Magua in the search for their father, a British officer. Little do they know, their father is being held captive by the Huron warriors, and Magua intends to betray them. Uncas, the last surviving warrior of the Mohican tribe and Hawkeye set out to rescue the hostages and the sisters before its too late.

programme.title: West of the Divide
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Ted Hayden, a tough hombre who goes undercover to join a gang led by a heartless fiend known only as Mr. Gentry (Lloyd Whitlock). Gentry is out to take over a ranch belonging to one of Haydens friends, but as Hayden finds out, Gentry has a lot more than that up his sleeve. Youll have to watch this two-fisted Western to find out the rest!

programme.title: Desperadoes of the West
programme.desc: A group of ranchers, led by Colonel Arnold and Ward Gordon, are drilling an oil well but getting fierce opposition from an unknown gang of outlaws. Eastern promoter J.B. Dude Dawson is behind the gang as he is out to prevent the co-op members from striking oil before their lease expires, so he can secure the property for his company. When Ward, with the help of Arnold and his daughter Sally, arranges for a new driller to be brought in, the replacement man is killed and one of Dawsons men takes his place.

programme.sub-title: S2005 : E15 Reliant Stadium - Houston, TX - Freestyle

programme.title: Arena in 30
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E01 Vivint Arena - Salt Lake City, UT
programme.desc: Arena in 30 returns to The Vivint Arena in Salt Lake City, UT. Reigning Series Champion, Krysten Anderson, tries to lead Grave Digger to the Arena Championship Series West Overall Event Championship. It will be a tough dirt road as she’ll have to surpass superstars like Tristan England, and Elvis Lainez.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2010 : E06 Metrodome - Minneapolis, MN - Freestyle

programme.title: Arena in 30
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E11 Huntington Center - Toledo, OH
programme.desc: The Huntington Center in Toledo, OH is ground zero for Arena Championship Series East action featuring: Weston Anderson in Grave Digger, Linsey Read in Scooby-Doo, Armando Castro in El Toro Loco, Dalton Widner in Jurassic Attack, Bernard Lyght in Megalodon, Hunter Souza in Earth Shaker, Chad Tingler in Zombie, and Frank Krmel in Stone Crusher.

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: S2009 : E01 World Finals X - Sam Boyd Stadium - Las Vegas, NV - Racing

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E18 ATandT Stadium - Arlington, TX
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series West returns to Texas as Ryan Anderson looks to continue his reign as the winningest driver at ATandT Stadium. Camden Murphy attempts to get back to his winning ways and lead Bakugan Dragonoid to a long overdue win. While Charlie Pauken returns to Grave Digger for the first time in four years.

programme.title: World Finals

programme.title: Motorsport Images: An Enduring Legacy
programme.desc: 26 million images. 100 years of racing. This is the story of Motorsport Images, the premiere photographic agency and archive covering motorsport and motoring. It is unique in that it provides photography of all major current motorsport events, from Formula One Grand Prix racing to national level racing, as well as archive images documenting the history of the sport dating back to 1895.

programme.title: DreamCars

programme.title: DreamCars

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: BMW M5, Mercedes-AMG E63, Audi RS6, and Mulsanne Speed: power limousines offer a unique mix of style, performance, and suitability for daily use. They combine the luxury of limousines with the dynamic of a super sports car.

programme.title: DreamCars

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Maseratis return to Italian motoring with a sportier model called the Ghibli.

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Rolls-Royce Dawn Convertible
programme.desc: Almost silently, it glides through the night; in front of the driver, 12 smoothly running cylinders are at work, with a power reserve that seems inexhaustible; the Rolls Royce Dawn is a convertible for connoisseurs.

programme.title: Perfect Ride

programme.title: Perfect Ride

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The coupe form makes cars sexy. But it is a question of faith - and in part a question of value - whether to opt for a more traditional two-door coupe, like the Mercedes E400, or its bigger brother, the CLS with four doors.

programme.title: Motorheads

programme.desc: Hans Joachim Stuck, a racing legend, ended his active career as a race driver in a Lamborghini Gallardo built by Reiter Engineering at the Nurburgring in 2011.

programme.title: 4x4

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The All Wheel Magazine reviews All-Wheel wagons from the compact, middle, and luxury class. With an output of 608 HP and a top speed of 325 kmph, the Alpina B5 Touring is the worlds fastest wagon.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: If cruising on the motorways is too boring, then off-road is the place to go. 4x4 shows how sporty and elegant SUVs really are, and which vehicles can really make your day on exciting off-road tracks.

programme.title: Ice Cream
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants an ice cream cone from the ice cream van.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winter’s morning to discover that the boiler is broken.

programme.title: Haunted House
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean is a bit too enthusiastic while cleaning his flat and Teddy ends up on his way to the dump.

programme.title: Scout Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes a Scoutmaster for the day.

programme.title: Taxi Bean
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one.

programme.title: Birthday Party
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is feeling down when everyone forgot his birthday.

programme.title: Back To School
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some.

programme.title: Litterbugs
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town.

programme.title: A Round of Golf
programme.desc: Mr. Bean fancies a game of golf.

programme.title: Wrestle Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to read a book but he is disturbed by the noise of Mrs. Wicket and her friend.

programme.title: Goldfish
programme.desc: Mr Bean nearly gets fed to the fish!

programme.title: Artful Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets a real bug for painting. Then several bugs… and flies and slugs and mice.

programme.title: Holiday For Teddy
programme.desc: Mr. Bean takes Teddy on holiday to the seaside.

programme.title: Stick It
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wicket’s nephew and Bruiser Jnr swopping football stickers.

programme.title: A Car For Irma
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV.

programme.title: The Newspaper
programme.desc: Every time Bean goes to collect the newspaper from the letterbox, it disappears.

programme.title: Running On Empty
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol.

programme.title: Fish Sitting
programme.desc: Mr. Bean has to look after Mrs. Wickets goldfish.

programme.title: Caring Bean
programme.desc: When Mrs. Wicket is disabled by Mr. Beans toy car, he takes care of her.

programme.title: Beans Bounty
programme.desc: Whilst digging for buried treasure, Mr Bean digs himself a hole too deep to get out of.

programme.title: A Dogs Life
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker.

programme.title: Homeless
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to let a room but no one will let him.

programme.title: Bean Bug
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas, and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person.

programme.title: The Visitor
programme.desc: Mr Bean learns that generosity can be an effective weapon against greed, gluttony and getting your hands back on your own TV remote control.

programme.title: The Big Stink
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor.

programme.title: Cat-Sitting
programme.desc: Mr Bean is forced to look after his worst enemy.

programme.title: Haircut
programme.desc: Mr Bean has a bad hair day.

programme.title: Bean Phone
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants a smartphone but does not have enough money to buy one.

programme.title: Lord Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is in the library to draw the family tree of kings.

programme.title: Royal Bean
programme.desc: During a visit to Buckingham Palace, Mr Bean meets the lady of the house.

programme.title: Where Did You Get That Cat?
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket has a new hat that looks like Scrapper.

programme.title: Young Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes a trip down Memory Lane.

programme.title: A Royal Makeover
programme.desc: Mr Bean redecorates his room, making it fit for a Queen.

programme.title: Dinner For Two
programme.desc: When invited to dinner by Mr Bean, it’s probably best to take your own sandwiches.

programme.title: The Cruise
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime.

programme.title: Eau De Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wicket’s new, expensive perfume on the floor.

programme.title: Valuable Lessons
programme.desc: Two burglars hatch up an evil plan in which one of them disguises himself as a gentleman.

programme.title: Spring Clean
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds that cleanliness can be a filthy business.

programme.title: Bed Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he can’t.

programme.title: Jumping Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try.

programme.title: Pizza Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean orders a takeaway pizza, but when it arrives, he feels let down by the size of it.

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irma’s Mum, at all costs.

programme.title: Rat Trap
programme.desc: Mr. Bean has to deal with an unwanted house guest but the stubborn rat refuses to leave.

programme.title: Gadget Kid
programme.desc: High-tech wizardry and low-tech cunning get Mr Bean out of a jam.

programme.title: Hopping Mad!
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds that tons of toads weigh loads and loads.

programme.title: Bean Painting
programme.desc: Mr. Bean paints a picture of Teddy, but accidentally splashes some green paint on the wall.

programme.title: Bean At The Museum
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks he’s just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden.

programme.title: Mobile Home
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind.

programme.title: Beans Safari
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey.

programme.title: Car Trouble
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes to the air after being taken for a ride.

programme.title: Inventor
programme.desc: A brand new lodger in the house could be a great new friend, or could be your worst enemy.

programme.title: Viral Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to read his book but gets interrupted by too much noise.

programme.title: Rare Bird
programme.desc: Mr. Bean loves bird spotting and is desperate to tick off the last elusive bird in his book.

programme.title: Dancing Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean needs to learn to dance to impress his girlfriend Irma.

programme.title: AMC Red Carpet - The Artifact
programme.desc: AMC Red Carpet brings you exclusive red carpet interviews with Nollywood stars at the premieres of top Nollywood movies and other industry events such as award ceremonies.

programme.title: No Late Nights
programme.desc: A newly-wed couple, James and Bella face challenges when Bella’s paranoia about night-time threatens their relationship.

programme.title: My Bosses
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Esther is stuck in a complicated love triangle between two men, Josh, a past love, and Ade, his fun, mischievous friend, both of whom happen to be her new bosses.

programme.title: My Chances
programme.desc: The loving marriage of Bryan and Jemima starts to show cracks when Bryan loses his job and they seek help from their landlord, Donald. Donald takes a liking to Jemima and offers her a job leading Bryan to begin to feel neglected.

programme.title: Salamatus Rhapsody
programme.desc: Salamatu, a young woman torn between her love for hip-hop and her family’s strong traditional values and expectations, must win her father over to support her love for hip hop.

programme.title: A Different Spice
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Daniel’s life comes crashing down when he catches his wife Emma cheating on him, making him believe that his near perfect life has been a lie. He seeks revenge by deciding to sleep with his mother in law but that plan soon leaves him full of shame.

programme.title: The Missing Chief Bridesmaid
programme.desc: Detective Lazarus battles life and work as he solves various crime puzzles - from a missing will tearing a family apart, an important package setting him on a wild goose chase, a missing chief bridesmaid days before a wedding and an expensive heirloom. But each case has twists and turns and shows not all is what it seems.

programme.title: A Step Downward
programme.desc: Doras world comes crumbling when her once loving fiance, a workaholic, loses his job and she becomes saddled with the responsibility of taking care of their needs. He becomes depressed and unintentionally drags her down the devastating pit of substance addiction.

programme.title: Frenemy
programme.desc: In the process of divorcing her husband, Peggy moves out of the house to start a new life and, hopefully, to forget all about the opposite gender, but life has other plans for her.

programme.title: Nobody But You
programme.desc: A single mum whose boyfriend deserted when she took in at a tender age, declares the said boyfriend persona non grata as he comes back fifteen years later wanting to have her back.

programme.title: Unbridled
programme.desc: Yinka, a playboy, is only interested in an open marriage with a wife who will never question his moves or affairs with other women, and he, in return, wouldn’t care about what his wife does. Taking unusual steps in his search, he meets bisola, a gorgeous woman who is happy with the terms, not knowing she is in love with someone else. As time goes on, yinka starts to fall in love with bisola but she reminds him of their terms, causing yinka to want a review on their original arrangement.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S6 - Demi Banwo
programme.desc: Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits its all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: Just One Call Away
programme.desc: A staunch believer returns from a 15-day business trip and exhibits symptoms of COVID-19. His pregnant wife, Kemi suspects he may have been exposed to the virus and insists they call NCDC to get him tested. However he fears he will be taken away and never get to see his family again.

programme.title: Blood and Rope
programme.desc: When 21-year-old Nnadubem becomes fascinated by the dambe traditional Hausa sport of bare- knuckle rope boxing. He has to convert a community of doubters and earn the respect of fellow fighters to be accepted as a warrior.

programme.title: Twisting Knives
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A young lady who believes she is in an incredibly happy marriage with her husband, finds out, just before his death, that he had cheated on her for years and had kept a second family away from her. Her misery is compounded when she finds out that her mother-in-law had knowledge of her husband’s other family. Bitterness eats at her as she believes everyone knew about her late husband’s treachery and she decides to twist knives in their hearts so they too will feel the pain of betrayal.

programme.title: Break Point
programme.desc: A young couple very much in love enjoy their great life together, but when Ken loses his job, it becomes hard to continue funding their luxurious lifestyle. Will they pass the ultimate true loves test or find comfort somewhere else?

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S6 - Daniel Etim Effiong
programme.desc: Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits its all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: Toll Free
programme.desc: A high flying therapist, finds herself triggered by a troubled couple who visits her clinic, forced to face her past trauma, she crosses all professional lines.

programme.title: Green
programme.desc: After years of being alone, believing they have missed out on love, two people, who are old in years but young at heart, find each other.

programme.title: Joy Ride
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. An Uber driver picks up a female passenger who has stolen a large sum of money from a rich psychopath. When he realizes this, he must decide whether to turn her in or become an accomplice as he soon starts to like her.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: When soft spoken and timid Temisan’s world turns upside down and her former loving husband starts to abuse her physically and verbally. She starts to find a seething rage building up inside her.

programme.title: Entangled
programme.desc: A once happy marriage starts to face crisis when the hunsband is promoted and starts having more responsibility at work, leaving his wife to believe he is now neglecting his family responsibilities.

programme.title: A Piece Of Me
programme.desc: Three sisters are torn apart by the actions of one. When Mercy becomes sick and her sister offers her own life to save her, all her sisters become overprotective leading to the wrong decisions being made.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep 4
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her 6-Cardinal Rules. The romantic comedy series touches on important issues such as mental health, anxiety, and self-doubt.

programme.title: Again

programme.title: Finding Faith

programme.title: Loving Ellen

programme.title: Car Heist

programme.title: Best Friends
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Depressed after getting past for a promotion, Dami gets drunk and ends up in bed with Oduva, the borfriend of her best friend, Ruth, who is a chronic cheat. Ashamed of her actions, she seeks refuge with Richard and they join forces to take down Oduva, after Ruth realises there is something wrong with Oduva.

programme.title: Black Petals
programme.desc: A single mum of two does all she can to meet the needs of her children but what happens when her son gets married to a controlling wife and is in debt to his father-in-law?

programme.title: AMC Music Moments - Playlist 460

But each case has twists and turns and shows not all is what it seems.
